With new content with over 10 hours of gameplay, new graphics, Quality of Life updates, and all DLCs packed into this new experience, this is how Blackthorn Arena was meant to be experienced.

name: Silent: Abandoned
description: Silent:Abandoned is a first-person psychological horror game. There are two brothers. They are vloggers. Michael And John. who love to vlog abandoned places. One night they go to an abandoned house.

name: Treepury
description: TREEPURY is a game where you hire adventurers, deploy them to production buildings, and defeat monsters to make your guild bigger and better.

name: Cat And Life
description: Cat And Life is not just a simulation game, but also a game full of love and care. You need to provide them with a comfortable living environment, decorate their world with cute decorations, feed them with delicious cat food, and create a world full of love and warmth for cats.

name: Kinzoku No Catana
description: This game is an ARPG like Genshin Impact if you ever played it. You go around exploring collecting things and doing quests. Engage in epic combat. Play as a black swordsman and enjoy the view, environment or overall ambience in this single-player experience.

name: Haven & Hearth
description:
Haven & Hearth comes to Steam with the release of World 16.

Haven & Hearth is a MMORPG (Massive Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game) set in a fictional world loosely inspired by Slavic and Germanic myth and legend. The game sets itself apart from other games in the genre in its aim to provide players with an interactive, affectable and mutable game world, which can be permanently and fundamentally changed and affected through actions undertaken by the players. Our fundamental goal with Haven & Hearth is to create a game in which player choices have permanent and/or lasting effects and, thus, providing said players with a meaningful and fun gaming experience.

name: Touch Grass VR Simulator
description: Touch Grass VR Simulator is a VR experience where you can relax in a virtual environment and touch grass, without actually going outside!

name: Waifu Simulator: Beach Edition

Discover these unique quests, making your romantic journey even more vibrant and colorful!

description: Arcane: League of Legends - Ready to unlock the world of Arcane? is a promotional online quiz game by Red Bull based on the Arcane: League of Legends series.

name: It's A Farmer Thing
description: In It's A Farmer Thing, you purchase a peaceful island. Raise animals, tend to crops, mine for resources, or pick apples – all without any pressure. Play solo or with friends. The game offers a laid-back, humorous atmosphere, Base Building and supports all languages with customizable language files.

name: The Spire of Mech Zero
description: A lite roguelike card deck building game inspired by Slay the Spire. You can experience battles of robots with cards and components! Try to conquer the spire with one perfect run, every choice matters!

name: Angry Birds Block Quest
description: Master the Block placements in this brand new Puzzle game! Work your way through novel levels and relax with satisfying mechanics

description: An interactive fiction game with a point-and-click interface. Follows the members of an ostensible high-school computer club as they attempt to program a world-simulator.

name: Farmagia: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Contains the base game, the Buddy Booster Pack, a Digital Artbook and the Original Soundtrack.

name: Hacky
description: Become an elite hacker in cyberpunk typing simulator. Infiltrate networks, steal data by typing simple commands. Unlocking new abilities as you go deeper. No coding skills needed.

name: Battle For Vera
description: Battle for Vera is a Real-Time Strategy game that draws inspiration from beloved classics, and improves upon many of their ideas to create an exciting new experience.

name: Metal Thunder
description: Command the legendary gunship in a high-octane action-roguelite! Engage insurgents with devastating firepower in ever-changing missions. Upgrade your arsenal, adapt to dynamic challenges, and survive relentless waves of enemies. Every run offers new tactics and chaos as you dominate the skies.

name: Wings of Njord
description: Soar through a medieval world of mystery and serenity as a raven on a journey to uncover hidden wonders.

name: Flood
description: Prepare yourself for the flood! Build crazy, wobbly boats and battle your friends until only one is left afloat.

name: Goner In The Town
description: Goner In The Town” is a 3D FPS RPG game in which players explore a section of a city cut off from another world and fight enemies by switching between four different guns. The game takes place in the present day,

name: Roll Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: Knight Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Chimp Memory
description: A logical reasoning and memory game that allows you to solve the same logic tests that neurological test monkeys solve in real life and will make you question whether you are capable of being smarter than a monkey. Get your name in the rankings and compete for leadership.

name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire Deluxe
description: Embark on a Zen Puzzle Adventure – Over 900 Levels of Mindful Strategy and Endless Fun!

name: Mahjong Riddles: Egypt
description:
Welcome to the mysterious world of Ancient Egypt! Solve mahjong levels and collect artifacts to uncover secrets of Giza valley, Old city, Desert and Nile.
Discover how the Great Pyramid of Giza was constructed, how Egyptians learned to read hieroglyphs, why Only the pharaoh could own a cat in Ancient Egypt and many more surprising facts.
Simple and engaging gameplay of mahjong solitaire is the best way to relax. We made it even better with new game features: you will find huge treasures, tricky locks, new bonus tiles and more. Solving some layouts is not easy, but you can always use powerups to beat the most challenging levels.

name: Fengdu: Chronicles of Battle
description: "Fengdu Chronicles of battle" is a roguelike game that combines auto chess and card building. The use of cards will directly affect the battle situation. Collect different cards, elixirs and magic tools in battles, combine your own strategy and complete this journey to become an immortal.

name: Almohadín: Escape from the Basement
description: Almohadín: escape from the basement is a hard platformer game featuring fun mechanics, a variety of levels and enemies, and multiple ways to complete each stage! It also has an intriguing story that will captivate the reader. The Basement holds many mysteries, and Almohadín must take risks and uncover them to find a way out into the outside world. Join him on his adventure!

name: Synthrome
description: Inspired by the iconic games of the early 2000s, particularly those known for their fast-paced momentum and intricate platforming, Synthrome offers a fresh twist on the genre while maintaining the adrenaline-pumping gameplay fans of the genre love.

name: Supermarket Simulator 2024
description:
Welcome to the world of "Supermarket Simulator 2024"! In this thrilling game, you become the owner and restorer of old and abandoned supermarkets. Your mission is to refurbish them, resume operations, and turn them into thriving shopping centers.

In "Supermarket Simulator ," you'll immerse yourself in the exciting world of business and restoration, where every decision you make matters. Are you ready to take on the challenge and turn abandoned supermarkets into thriving enterprises?

name: Rogue Tanks
description: Blast through random levels of enemies with or against up to 3 of your friends in this action roguelike top-down shooter! Travel from the desert to the enemy base and...into space!? Upgrade with quicker firing, bouncing bullets, and more. Defeat huge bosses to unlock more tank classes!

name: Refarm
description: The ocean took it all… now take it back! In this short semi-idle island builder you’ll resurface fertile farmland - tile by tile. As you plant, harvest and expand you’ll obtain helping hands and discover what else lies below the surface.

name: Aero The Acro-Bat: Rascal Rival Revenge
description:
Help Aero rescue his friends and girlfriend, so everyone can enjoy the circus again!
The 2002 remake of Aero the Acro-Bat is back and better than ever!

This remake includes improved sprites, modified stages and skills, as well as a whole new comic-style introduction scene.

name: Me & My Friend Pippa!
description: Make your mark as an aspiring adventurer by embarking on a journey to save King Elesio's missing Pippa in this charming bite-sized RPG!

name: Ragdoll Universe
description: Enjoy a ragdoll physics game full of challenges and fun. Overcome levels inspired by famous situations, collect points, unlock characters and upgrades. Shoot, fight, jump, and laugh out loud in this exciting world of random characters. Join the action!

name: Cool Cucumber Cricket Manager
description: Think of your favourite sports management game, now imagine it's about cricket. Pretty cool right? Now imagine instead of all those boring features your club was managed with a deck of cards! Wow that sounds like a pretty cool game. Welcome to Cool Cucumber Cricket Manager.

name: The Fight: Aftermath
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey through a world torn apart by catastrophe. As a lone survivor, navigate treacherous terrain, scavenge for essentials, and confront the horrors of the apocalypse. Will you overcome adversity and rebuild civilization, or succumb to the chaos of the wasteland?

name: Swordia
description: Traverse Swordia, a community-driven MMORPG with skill-based progression, PVP, PVE, and endless possibilities. Inspired by the classics, experience a mix of dungeon crawling, farming, mining, and more. Help development with your choices and feedback.

name: Tanks of Freedom II
description: A turn-based strategy with up to four armies fighting against each other. Challenge yourself in a campaign against AI, or a hot-seat battle with a friend. Follow the story of Prince Tybalt and restore peace in the Amber Noon kingdom.

name: Deep Inside
description: Deep Inside is a first-person psychological horror game! You are a police officer who has to find out who is behind the most high-profile murders in the city. Use your detective skills to catch the killer, but remember that the truth can be bitter!

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 5
description:
A brand-new Hawaiian island will be added to the game at the launch of Season 5 - in November 2024 - for free!

Maui, a captivating jewel in the Hawaiian crown - the island embodies an exquisite blend of culture, adventure, and natural wonders, thus offering an enchanting setting for the Motorfest Festival.

From the vibrant energy of Kahului urban grounds to the awe-inspiring landscapes of Haleakalā National Park and its bamboo forest, going through the iconic Ohe’o Gulch sacred pools with its cascading waterfalls, Maui beckons with endless exploration.

Maui will add a whopping 345km of total road network to the game, with 229km of that being asphalt and 190km of dirt roads. So, get ready for some amazing island exploration!

name: Level Up: The Playable Rap Album
description: The one of a kind 2D side-scrolling adventure that combines action-packed gameplay with a hip-hop album. Created by a 2 time Ninja Warrior and Nerdcore Rapper Creative Mind Frame get ready to immerse yourselves in a lyrical hip hop journey through an immersive 16-bit experience.

name: Duelite
description: The Wild West dueling card roguelite. Duelite is an attractive card game where you must survive countless duels against all types of rivals in the Wild West. Will you be able to build a deck on par with the most wanted? Find out yourself!

name: Desert Kingdoms 2
description: Desert Kingdoms 2 is a minimal real-time strategy game. Manage resources, develop villages, protect your king and conquer the desert!

name: Card Quest
description: Card Quest is a game themed around the image of cats, featuring a rich combination of elemental schools, random equipment upgrades and breakthroughs, unique core gameplay for each chapter, and various random events.

name: Rise of Robots
description: Rise of Robots is a Roguelite Shooter where you build a powerful weapon as you fight to survive ever increasing swarms of robots. Stack powerups to create a unique weapon each run and beat the challenge on each map

name: Forgotten Playland
description:
Forgotten Playland is a free-to-play, social party game that takes place in the quiet solitude of a long-forgotten and abandoned house, where a whimsical world unfolds.

Within the dusty rooms and forgotten corners of time, an enchanting realm comes to life as the once-discarded toys left by their owners embark on a magical journey of their own.

Welcome to Forgotten Playland, a realm where the PlushKyns breathe life into a world of games and adventures.

name: Ezerath 3D
description: The 3d remaster of Ezerath's Last Hope, featuring improved dungeons, more stats to upgrade your character with, and refined in-game systems!

name: Plane Starship2: Galactic Contender
description: This is a 4x turn-base strategy game which uses a fast-paced warchess system. You can develop your planet, expand your territory by colonizing and building space stations, research technology to unlock more ships, and ultimately discover and eliminate your enemies.

name: Moaisland
description: Moaisland is a humorous and surreal, first-person, retro-styled, point-and-click adventure game starring the mysterious Moai statues of Rapa Nui (Easter Island).

name: D-Day VR Museum
description: Step into the pages of history with "D-Day VR Museum", an immersive virtual reality experience that brings the monumental events of D-Day to life like never before. Transport yourself back to June 6, 1944, and witness the heroic actions of Allied forces during the largest amphibious assault in history.

name: Sociopat
description: Sociopat is an absurd comedy driven game that combines point and click adventure with action packed FPS game. Play in a role of an anti-hero and do some mischievous acts, NOW!

name: AI Fantasy
description: A text adventure with everything pre-generated and illustrated by AI. 100 unique stories, over 10,000 events, several thousand items, narrated story, AI-generated music, and progression between runs.

name: Starlight Riddles
description: Starlight City is a city where the boundaries of reality are blurred. Waking up in an unfamiliar city with no memories of the past, you will find that you are not the only one suffering from amnesia. Residents of the city have also lost touch with their past, shrouding the place in mysteries.

name: Meowhiss the Snake
description: "Meowhiss the snake" is a cute 2D game whose core gameplay is based on classic Snake, but also combined with some roguelike elements for you to explore. Before losing all the head-body, gear up your character, reach more levels, and get more scores!

name: Emberdrift
description: A flow platforming rogue-like with extremely fast paced combat and traversal, punctuated by insane movement abilities, epic bosses, and over-the-top upgrades.

name: 100 Cats Singapore
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Singapore! Can you find them all?

name: Corruption Town
description: Control Agnes as she tries to resist the temptations of the lecherous men around her. Manage the Limping Duck, a shady inn where the wretched go to have a drink and ogle Agnes! It's your choice to help her succumb to corruption or fight it!

name: Frostbiter
description: Can you survive Frostbiter and escape his snowy maze of horror? Use snowballs to defend yourself, find your way in the maze, try to escape, and most important of all: don't let him catch you!

name: Home Domes
description: Explore this life sim on a new planet. Create your new home on the rugged surface of Mars during the early days of colonization inside the safety of your new Dome. Everyday life on a new planet has new challenges and more difficulties of surviving out on the Domestead.

name: Magicraft
description: "Magicraft" is a Roguelike game that uses a variety of spells to match unimaginable spell effects, and the construction of ultra-high degrees of freedom cannot even be exhausted by developers.

name: Battle Poet
description: Battle demons with poetry to reclaim the Holy Mountain in this Strategy Roguelike about combining lines of poetry in turn-based combat.

name: Nightmare Knight: Sacred Maiden & Fallen Magic
description: The young girl Rain, who became the sacred knight of the kingdom, was entrusted by Jas, the leader of the sacred knights and her lover, to investigate the disturbances occurring in a distant town named "Hakudeti".

name: Kizuyami
description: Kizuyami is an atmospheric psychological horror game. You find yourself in a never-ending Japanese street that you cannot exit wherever you go. You stumble upon the same house over and over again, which calls for you in inexplicable ways. Will you be able to find your way out?

name: Albatroz
description: Leave your dull urban life behind and set out on a journey to find your lost brother, who disappeared while looking to reach a mythical mountain called Albatroz. Use your survival skills to traverse beautiful yet challenging landscapes, ranging from scorching coastal regions to freezing mountains. Manage your resources, strengthen your body, and improve your abilities as you face the wilderness head-on. Discover yourself as you find that the journey might actually be just as important as the destination.

name: Farmagia
description: Command an army of monsters in this all-new action game featuring character designs by famed manga artist Hiro Mashima. Take a stand to free the people of Felicidad as a Farmagia named Ten when monster farming, adventure, and hectic battles come together in an epic tale of rebellion and friendship.

name: Sainthood
description: Sainthood is a cozy strategy game about serving your community and growing your faith. Explore a miniature world and help the islanders by constructing buildings, delivering resources, and volunteering. Pray and attend to other spiritual activities as you rise to become a Saint!

name: Homicipher
description: Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.

name: Gunfield
description: Gunfield - A game that combines genres: shoot 'em up, roguelite and bullet heaven. Destroy hordes of alien ships and giant bosses, unlock and upgrade new weapons and abilities.

name: Together Tree: Romance 911
description: Together Tree: Romance 911 is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Complete daily challenges, complete session evaluations and have a great time rating each other's progress as they rate and review your own.

name: Conspiracy: Tower Defense
description: Tower Defense game where you build units to destroy incoming waves of monsters.

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023
description: Car for sale simulator 2023 game in detail, you can buy and sell vehicles in the town and you can sell more vehicles by establishing a vehicle gallery and developing your company.

name: Elin
description: Successor to the roguelike RPG "Elona". Adventure, survival, crafting, home-building, myths passed down, and stories of humans and Elea spun. What scars will you leave on the land of Ylva?

name: The Good People: Na Daoine Maithe
description: The Good People (Na Daoine Maithe) is a lore-rich and choice-driven historical fantasy visual novel inspired by Irish mythology and Celtic folklore. Play as a tenant farmer from mid-19th century Ireland, whose path becomes inexplicably entwined in fairy affairs after getting robbed by the roadside and lured into the mythic and war-torn world of Tír na nÓg: A once unified land, now divided into the Seelie and Unseelie Courts. Will you escape and return home with your stolen belongings? Or does fate have something else in mind?

name: Reindeer Story
description: Reindeer Story is a 2D Adventure RPG! Run, Jump and Battle through 6 chapters of this Wintery Epic! Fight foes in turn based battles with a real-time element, dodge enemies attacks in the Battle Zone and retaliate with Z-Skills!

name: Sunshower
description: When the rain starts and nobody else seems to mind that it destroys everything in its path, one plant-topped robot answers the call in this rainy-day arcade survival game.

name: Sketch Crawler
description: Sketch Crawler is a super-creative deck-building roguelike single player RPG game about the King of Cartoons who lost his kingdom in a wicked magic picture.

name: Valley of Shadow
description: An autobiographical puzzle game. Solve puzzles using classic spells (Light, Force Missile, Fireball) while you explore a dark world full of secrets.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.8
description: Sin descripción

name: Miku Legends 2
description: Get ready to dive into the world of Mega Man Legends 2 like never before! In this special mod, the iconic blue hero has been swapped out for the Vocaloid superstar herself—Hatsune Miku! Grab your buster (or should we say, Miku-themed buster?), and explore this fan-favorite adventure in full Miku style. This isn’t just a character swap—it’s a full Miku transformation!

name: Labyrinth of Wild Abyss: LayeRedux
description: A horror game about paranoia and endurance predation. You cannot beat the monsters, you can only outrun. They are slow, they aren't smart, but they are patient, they are many, and they are powerful.

name: Hangman
description: A strange game of hangman with a strange man. Traverse through the darkness, letters, & watchful eyes to save your friend. Decode notes left behind to uncover the message that you never got, but should have had.

name: Reaktor
description: Reaktor: A modern spin on the classic block-stacking game! Features 360° block stacking, mind bending goodness. Play solo, or team up with friends in local co-op, and climb the leaderboards to fame.

name: Crown Simulator: Royal Life simulation
description: Crown Simulator — a royal life simulation where every decision shapes the fate of your kingdom! Manage your army, strengthen relations with neighbors, care for your people and treasury. Can you maintain balance and become a great ruler? Make your choices and rule!

name: As Dusk Falls: Special Edition
description:
As Dusk Falls is an original interactive drama from INTERIOR/NIGHT that explores the entangled lives of two families across thirty years.
Special Edition includes: Game, Cinematic Poster, Collector's Box, Dante's Black Book, Postcards, Pins and Desert Dream Motel Replica Key.

name: Im Bann Der Dunklen Jagd
description: Dive into an immersive co-op horror experience with a friend. As detectives, you’ll search for clues in a sinister area and must survive the horrors lurking within. Work together to find all the objects and escape before doom catches up with you.

name: Penguin Hotel
description: Game in a series of horror, action, story, and mystery-solving elements set in the Penguin Hotel, celebrating its 18th anniversary.

description:
Blasphemous 2 is the critically acclaimed second installment in the brutal side-scrolling metroidvania series.

Unveil the deepest secrets with the Blasphemous 2 Mea Culpa Edition, combining the base game and Mea Culpa Expansion.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Farming Harvester Simulator 2025: Deluxe Edition
description: Harvest the Future: Master the Fields in Farming Harvester Simulator 2025 Deluxe Edition!

name: Karaoke Party: Sing & Dance
description: Immerse yourself in this fun children's karaoke where you can sing and watch animals dance to the rhythm of the music.

name: Gore Crush
description: Crush body parts together in this gory soft physics puzzle game. Create disgusting combos as your smash together like body parts keeping your bloody abattoir from overflowing as you chase ever higher scores.

name: Forestygian
description: Roguelike Deckbuilder inspired by Action RPGs. Build a powerful deck to support abilities of your hero. Use abilities to puzzle through hordes of enemies.

name: Hentai Girls: Winky Witch
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Need for speed: Mobile
description: At sunset in Hot Bay World, Ajie and Vera stood at the highest point of Hot Bay, looking at this endless racing paradise.

name: Forbidden Love
description: Guide two souls in an impossible love story. Your decisions will lead them to happiness or tragedy. Their fate is in your hands!

name: Journey to Kreisia
description: Blazing a new trail in classic RPGs, Journey to Kreisia is bound to please fans of the genre with plenty of engaging features such as hunting for hidden treasures, testing one's strength in challenging battle arenas, and taking up a variety of subquests! Customize the fighting technique by raising weapon levels, equipping various orbs, and using extremely handy monster guide when in need of more information to perfect your battle skills!

name: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Deluxe Edition
description:
Obtain a variety of weapons and armor, including curiosities from a forgotten era with the Deluxe Edition. You’ll receive weapon and armor sets for the Warrior, Mage, and Rogue classes as well as armor sets and weapons for each of your 7 companions. That’s 3 armor sets for Rook, 6 weapons for Rook, 7 companion armor sets, and 7 companion weapons – saving Thedas never looked so good.

• 6 Weapon Appearances For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Warrior Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Mage Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Rogue Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 7 Weapon & 7 Armor Set Appearances For Companions. Cosmetic Only.

Enter the world of Thedas, a vibrant land of wilderness, treacherous labyrinths, and glittering cities – steeped in conflict and magics. Now, a pair of corrupt ancient gods have broken free from centuries of darkness and are hellbent on destroying the world.

Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods in Dragon Age: The Veilguard.

SAVE A BATTERED WORLD
Enter Thedas, a vibrant world of rugged wilderness, treacherous labyrinths and glittering cities. The world is teetering on a knife’s edge while corrupt gods unleash havoc across the continent. Nations war and factions splinter. Who will you trust? From the Arlathan Forest to the back alleys of Minrathous, this is a broken world. Your actions will affect the fate of Thedas forever.

UNITE THE VEILGUARD
Unite a team of seven companions, each with rich lives and deep backstories. These are characters to befriend, and even fall in love with. Among them, an assassin, a necromancer, a detective, each and all bringing their own expertise and unique abilities to the fight. You are never alone, decide who to take into battle and together face down demons, dragons and corrupt gods.

BECOME THE LEADER OTHERS BELIEVE IN
Select from different races and combat classes, customize your appearance, choose your character’s backstory and begin your journey as Rook, Dragon Age’s newest hero. The choice is yours. On your adventures, you’ll gain new abilities and discover unique, powerful artifacts to enhance your own combat style. Brace yourself, there are tough decisions to be made, allies to inspire, and a fight that needs every sword, staff and bow you can muster.

name: Alpine Zone
description: Sin descripción

name: Math Genius: Multiplication
description: Math Genius: Multiplication is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated multiplication problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: 13th House on Halloween
description:
You finally bought a house, but it's the 13th house on the street and it's Halloween... so who knows what you actually bought...

Are you ready to experience why is it a bad idea to go against superstition on Halloween? In this game you will get to and see the consequences, and maybe even live trough it... but who knows, anything can happen on Halloween...

name: Ratshaker
description: RATSHAKER is the fun and quirky solution to all your rat problems! Hold on to the RAT, shake your arm, and watch life’s problems disappear! How far can you go?

name: Yangshuo Invasion
description: Doom 1 episode replacement with familiar guns and demons modified for more lightweight, fast-paced gameplay, plus a bunch of unique additional features. Built around Bite-Sized Threats, a vanilla-compatible gameplay mod that speeds up the pace of Doom by drastically reducing both monster health and ammo available.

name: The Uzujigoku Massacre
description:
Takiyo Mochizuki is accepted into Heaven’s Bridge Boarding School, Japan’s most elite academy. Renowned for molding talented individuals into Ultimates - skilled professionals in their desired fields - Heaven’s Bridge accepts students between 10-20 in its pursuit of notable alumni destined to make their mark on Japanese history.

After an unfortunate tragedy forced the school into a temporary shutdown some years ago, it has now reopened, and intends to restart its prestigious legacy with its 21st class.

Unbeknownst to them, another tragedy is quickly approaching.

name: Softie
description: Softie is a short creepy (but cute!) point-and-click adventure game. Take on the role of a cuddly teddy bear trying to find their lost owner in a peculiar house.

name: Horror High
description:
HORROR HIGH is a '90s horror/comedy 4v1, competitive survival, open-map RPG.
Up to four high school stereotypes face iconic monsters as they attempt to survive and escape.

Journey around the expansive town of Creepertin as you gave weapons, health, flashlights, and key items you'll need to rebuild long-abandoned vehicles and flee to safety. Or, team up and try to take down your pursuer!

name: Mint Fantome's Freak or Treat
description: Join Mint and her friends on a spooky-fun Halloween adventure! Trick or treat through eerie but charming neighbourhoods, discovering candies, coins, and cute characters in every level. Use her Halloween costume powers to overcome obstacles and explore hidden areas. Can you help Mint collect every treat and meet all of her friends?

name: Realm of Chaos 2
description: On October 31st, 1996, The Macintosh Team released Realm of Chaos, the first Mac-made megawad. Now, in a rare opportunity, 2 of the original mappers, Steve Duff and Rob Berkowitz, and his son, Leo Berahovich, along with a team of veterans and fans of RoC, have combined to create Realm of Chaos 2: The Revenge of '96! The style of this megawad is oldschool with occasional fashion-forward maps. The mix is eclectic, similar to the original RoC, with broadly defined episode themes. Difficulty ranges from mild to challenging, especially in the episode-ending maps.

name: Moida Mansion
description: Oh no! The Adventure Club's official mascot turtle has carelessly wandered into Moida Mansion. Your friends went after her and got trapped! They broke the golden T.A.C. rule: "Stay out of Moida Mansion." Now it's up to you. Sneak in and rescue them before it's too late!

name: The End of an Obsession
description:
You feel groggy when you finally wake up.

The back of your head is throbbing and your mouth feels dry, as though it has been stuffed full of wool.

With bleary eyes, you glance about.

What time is it?

Where are you…

And, perhaps more importantly, who are you?

Try though you might, you can’t remember.

This could very well be your end — but wait. Who is that woman standing by your bedside, who looks like a rose?

Perhaps she can help you.

Now, why don’t you open your heart up to her?

Learn how to love her, and perhaps this story might even have a happy ending.

name: Necromantic Thirst
description: Necromantic Thirst is a Boom compatible (-complevel 9) 32-map megawad developed by the French Doom Community (and friends), inspired by some well-known classic wads of yesteryear, and featuring a new take on the standard progression : classic UAC techbases slowly but surely blend into a new, twisted, green and black hellish world. Beware of the evil spirit that inhabits these industrial and medieval worlds, or you might end up losing your sanity.

name: Ultimate Survivors
description: Ultimate Survivors is a fast-paced strategy game with innovative tower defense and tower offense mechanics. Enter the chaotic world wrecked by a nuclear apocalypse, where the wacky arena battles are the only means of entertainment and excitement for the surviving rabble. Build your team of four extraordinary heroes, each with unique powers and abilities, jump into the arena to challenge players from all around the world, and become the Ultimate Survivor!

name: Pour Quelques Bonbons...
description:
Play as a little child in the mysterious village of Enserine.
Collect as many candies as you can and fill your candy book before the other children and win the race !

name: Elf Survivor
description: Elf Survivor is a challenging 2D survival action game. Players will struggle to survive in a dangerous world, facing a constant stream of enemies.

name: Cyberkiller2049
description: Cyberkiller 2049 is a platform-action fast-paced game that battles numerous enemies on destructible platforms. Manipulate the character, kill with one hit, sprint, kill enemies. Picking up bats, remote-controlled bombs. Fight enemies with different abilities.

name: Vampire Survivors: Ode to Castlevania
description: The Vampire Survivors have come a long way in their honorable hunt, and after joining forces with the Belmont Family, they are the closest they've ever been. Finally, within their grasp... A vampire. Possibly, at least.

name: Behemoth
description: Dodge ‘n flap your wings in this new arcade extravaganza from The Behemoth! Become one with the chicken, secure your flock in the nest, and collect as much candy corn as possible!

name: Fairy Card Battlers
description: A DCG with fast-paced strategic battles that conclude in 8 turns. Simple yet deep mind games emerge from card placement and the choice of benefits at the start of each turn. Will you enjoy the fairies' antics in the story, or aim for the top of the rankings in pseudo-multiplayer?

name: Human Fall Flat VR
description: Experience the blockbuster physics platformer, now in VR! Explore an imaginative world of floating dreamscapes with an all-new control method, providing direct control of each of your Human’s arms.

name: SankakkuDoku
description: S.O.S! Astronaut Aki-chan needs your help urgently....

name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 5
description: A relaxing coloring-by-numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.

name: Ghost Assassin: Stealth Strike
description: Embark on a stealthy adventure—eliminate foes, remain invisible.

name: Chess 'n' Blocks
description: Have you ever considered playing Chess and Tetris simultaneously? Guess what? My strange brain did for years; I don't know why. But I finally took the time to create this game. And that's how chess 'n' blocks was born.

name: Grave Filler
description: A graveyard themed, suika style puzzle game.

name: The Exit Project: Backstreets
description: Don't get stuck in this loop for the rest of your life.

name: Vetitum_VRC
description: Explore all the video tapes about the forest and the paranormal activities that happen, discover all the secrets by controlling who records these videos in a first person experience. Do not watch the video too many times, there is something strange about it.

name: Magic Cats Pots
description: Repair magical pots with cats!

name: The Limb
description: In a post-apocalyptic world overrun by monsters due to an unknown virus, some people have managed to survive. During these times, an organization formed by elite members of society emerged, fighting against the monsters and aiming to restore the world to its original state.

name: Fishing Grind
description: Fishing Grind is a first person 1-6 player co-op fishing game with a twist. The place you are fishing may not always be safe...

name: Widget Inc.
description: A hybrid factory builder / incremental clicker game. Starting from humble beginnings, master the many crafting processes to build up resources and expand your factory. Then, using your newly automated production, unlock new technology and grow ever closer to your goal of spreading to the stars.

name: Raiden Nova
description:
Raiden unites! Get ready to blast into a thrilling new dimension like never before!

The legendary vertical-scrolling shooter Raiden is reborn as a thrilling twin-stick 2D shooter! Freely aim and shoot with dual sticks, dodging bullets from every direction.

Level up to unlock a variety of weapons and enhancements, and upgrade your ship to fight your way through epic battles.

name: Tlatoani
description: Discover the wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder adorned with beautiful hand drawn 2D graphics. From humble beginnings rise to build, trade and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).

name: Hi! These Are Your Eyeballs
description: Our eyes define and shape everything that happens in life. Become a delivery courier for EyeBallStore and help the residents of Limb Alley see the world in a new light after a long time spent in darkness.

name: Sadball
description: Chase pins as a bowling ball with dreamlike abilities in a surreal bowling alley.

name: Triangle Strategy
description: TRIANGLE STRATEGY on Meta Quest offers a complex, tactical battle system enhanced by intuitive VR controls that make for an immersive hands-on RPG experience. Utilize 360-degree 3D movement on the battlefield and place characters yourself to fine-tune combat strategy – with the characters’ fates literally in your hands, players can experience the dramatic story of clashing kingdoms like never before. The title also supports Meta Quest’s Passthrough feature on Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S, meshing the game’s environment with real-world surroundings to create next-level immersion.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Bean to Me!
description: Use strange and magical beans to bend the rules and chain together absurd synergies in a wild twist on the ancient game of Mancala. Battle your friends, collect new beans, and build the ultimate bean loadout.

name: Honey Farm Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Blasphemous II: True Torment
description:
Blasphemous II: True Torment update includes New Game Plus mode, expansion of existing zones, new zone connections, new abilities, new enemies, new prayers, quality-of-life features, accessibility features and more.

In more detail:

Expanded zones: Choir of Thorns, Sunken Cathedral, and Basilica of Ancient Faces have all been reforged with new challenges to explore and conquer.
New connecting zones: Quicker traversal between previously explored areas.
A new challenge: the Labyrinth of Tides presents a new challenge for this ready to face it.
New Game +: Totally adjustable difficulty options from stronger enemies to deadlier spikes and lethal falls.
New Enemies: Cvstodia’s denizens rise to face you, are you up to their challenge?
A host of upgrades for the Penitent One, quality-of-life improvements, and new achievements.

name: Blasphemous II: Mea Culpa
description:
The ascension to penitence never ends. Strike down the enemies who stand in your way as you reveal pathways within Cvstodia to forgotten areas. Retrieve the shards and feel the stinging pain in your hands from the punishment you embraced, once more.

You can expect new quest alongside with new attacks, combos and special abilities. The DLC contains two new zones and two new bosses to fight.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered
description: Experience the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn with stunning new visuals and upgraded features. In a far future where colossal machines roam the Earth, pockets of humanity survive in unique tribes among the lush, overgrown ruins of our long-lost civilization.

name: Shissou shita Yuujin no Heya ni Nokosareteita Game
description: Would like you to solve the mystery contained in the game.

name: Native Isekai Defense
description: As part of the Pioneer Corps, form a party with other players and take on missions to protect humanity's last remaining land and reclaim the contaminated territories from the enemies!

name: After Tasks
description: Overtime horror game to be played at school late at night. Wait for the video playback to complete or go solve the paranormal, the choice is yours.

name: The Sims 4: Life and Death
description: Peel back the veil to uncover the secret to fuller Sim lives and beyond in The Sims 4 Life & Death Expansion Pack.

name: The Smurfs Dreams: Cosmic Costume
description:
Sparkle up!
Venture from dream to dream in this dazzling cosmic costume!

name: Day at the Office: Prologue
description: Try to escape from the office, make your decisions carefully, and keep your cool to get home safe and sound... Do you hear that...? The phone is ringing, and it's for you.

name: Chrono Ark: High Roller
description:
Casino-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with its own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as casino-themed skins for Lucy and 6 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Helia & Selena, Miss Chain, Momori, Narhan, and Silverstein.

name: Poppy Playtime Triple Pack
description: ﻿THREE GAMES IN 1 PACK! Embark on an epic journey filled with mystery, puzzles, eerie environments and the most terrifying toy characters to ever come to life. Over a decade ago, all the employees of Playtime Co. mysteriously vanished, except for you. You must return and discover what really happened at the now abandoned factory of the most popular toy company in history. But beware the toys are now alive, and they may not be as friendly as they seem. Take your first steps into Playtime Co. with the first 3 chapters in the Poppy Playtime saga! Chapter 1: A Tight Squeeze - Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility...and don't get caught. Chapter 2: Fly in a Web - Descend deeper into the toy factory where mind-numbing puzzles and horrific toys await. Grapple and swing your way to safety. Try to escape - and don't let Mommy find you. Chapter 3: Deep Sleep - A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this frightening place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the puzzles, characters and clues you encounter...If you can survive.

name: Land of Mushrooms
description: Dive into the Land of Mushrooms , where enchanting fungi come to life! Combine a delightful array of mushrooms, from the elegant Parasol to the flavorful Chanterelle, as you skillfully drop them into the pot.

name: Wormhole
description: Eat, shoot, dash, and explode your way through the cosmos in this adrenaline-fuelled arcade action game. WORMHOLE is a roguelike twist on the classic snake format featuring a stackable perk system and 100+ hand-crafted levels.

name: Zero-Sum Heart
description: "I" make a deal with the witch to give up my heart, in exchange for love— from everyone. Is it worth it if losing my heart means gaining *his*?———————————————————————In this short visual novel, make choices and answer the question: is love a zero-sum game?

name: White Cat Adventure Team
description: You will play the role of the White Cat Adventure Team, embarking on adventures on this fantasy continent and experiencing the story. Search and collect various skills and items to face various battles.

name: Black Submarine
description: Deep into the unknown, navigate the shadows to uncover forgotten treasures. Every click, a choice; every shadow, a secret. Embark on a sinister underwater journey in search of a lost pirate legacy.

name: Concrete
description: Congratulations [CITIZEN NAME]. Your personal identifier number was selected in the monthly Citizen Labour Lottery. Report to City Block 07 to begin your work assignment. Welcome, work hard, and ignore all signs of life: you are alone.

name: Sodablood
description: Chase pins as a bowling ball with dreamlike abilities in a surreal bowling alley.

name: My Wet Leto Comic: A Day of Green
description: An anecdote adventure game for the MWLC.Play as the heroine, Green, and have fun experiencing that day when you were a student while constantly making all sorts of trouble (?).

name: Darwin
description: Enter a tough-as-nails retro old school trip, Darwin is a daunting gauntlet of a speedrunning platformer. It requires the player to move fast and be agile, but to also be prepared to die. Again. Again. And again. Can you survive the trials in Slugtopia, defeat the nasty Wormilon, and make it home?

name: Another Hope
description: Trapped in a doorless room, you must follow the commands given to you. This psychological horror experience will test your resolve and sanity. Can you escape, or will you remain imprisoned forever?

name: Aunt Fatima
description:
Aunt Fatima is a horror game where you play the role of a kidnapped person by Aunt Fatima and her husband who found a way to escape from the house. Aunt Fatima and her husband kidnap people, force them to stream on the dark web, then kill them and sell their organs on the black market. You are the only one who managed to find a way to escape from the house.

To escape, you need to solve puzzles, collect items that will help you along the way, and find keys to unlock your way out. Aunt Fatima roams around the house, and if she sees you, she will chase you. Try to hide in cabinets to avoid her. Uncover the buried secrets of the house.

name: Timeout
description: Timeout is a fast-paced deck-building + team strategy game. Venture into a retro pixel-art style world, organize a team of up to 3 characters to build independent decks for them, challenge enemies on the timeline in ATB turn-based battles, and ultimately achieve victory

name: Miner Vidis
description: Join the adventure of Vidis, a robot miner who smashes rocks and mines Gemstones. Classic color-based puzzles where simple rules, different strategies, and order are important.

name: Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane
description: School life in the Veilcrest Academy turned out to be more complicated than you expected. A magical world of wonder opens up as three magical men take special interest in you.

name: Yapori Minigames
description: Yapori Minigames is a multiplayer game with mini-games and several playable characters! Various different and challenging mini-games, such as the meteor mini-game where you have to dodge meteors until time runs out, a soccer mini-game where you have to score a specific number of goals before time runs out to win, and more!

name: Hell Survivors
description: Hell Survivors is a survival roguelite where countless hordes of demons rise from the abyss. Compose a multitude of mighty builds and eradicate waves of nightmare creatures. Will you be able to survive Hell?

name: Totally Spies! Cyber Mission
description:
Totally Spies! Cyber Mission is a brand-new story set in the world of the new Season 7 of the Totally Spies! series.

Playing as Sam, Clover and Alex, players will be plunged into the heart of Singapore, where every street and every corner holds secrets to be discovered. Whether playing solo or in local multiplayer mode for up to three players, they will have the opportunity to master the art of infiltration, solve complex puzzles and, thanks to a variety of fashionable gadgets, save the world with style!

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story 2nd
description: A follow-up to The Quintessential Quintuplets: Quints Puzzle Story The Quintessential Quintuplets: Quints Puzzle Story2nd is a “memorial adventure game” featuring the events, cards, and stories from “The Quintuplets Can't Divide the Puzzle Into Five Equal Parts”, the October 27, 2020-released smartphone game based on The Quintessential Quintuplets, minus the puzzle game elements.

name: Underworld Overseer
description: Become the master of your dungeon, command your army of demons, expand your territory, place strategic traps and defeat waves of adventurers with your powerful spells.

name: Backstage: Murdered Sleep
description: ~PASS BEYOND THE WALL OF SLEEP~~~ Backstage: murdered sleep is a psychological thriller and survival horror adventure game. It is the long-dreaded sequel to beloved niche 2005 rpgmaker horror classic Backstage: A Nightmare In One Act.

name: Blood On The Thames
description: A murder mystery puzzle game with visual novel elements in a Gothic, Lovecraftian world. Collect clues, solve puzzles, interrogate suspects, and uncover the mystery surrounding the death of Mini’s husband.

name: [Redacted]
description: In [REDACTED], a fast-action isometric roguelike, a shadowy agent watches Black Iron Prison spiral into chaos. As one of the last guards, fight through monsters, rivals, and reanimated corpses of your fellow guards to escape the penitentiary alive.

name: Law: Transporter
description: LAW (pronounced Land Air Water) is an arcade transporter racing game about transporting goods and passengers by land, air and water.

name: Boss Breaker
description: Punch everything in your path. Overthrow old gods and new foes, upgrade your fists, and discover new abilities. Uncover the secrets of Nexus Orion Labs.

name: Backrooms: Lost Place
description: Single-player horror game based on the backrooms universe. Your task is to pass levels, puzzles and try not to die during all this.

name: Zomb Bomb
description: A fast pace retro arcade shooter. Fight waves of zombies and dragons with a great gun collection. Battle five wild bosses all while trying to keep the high score.

name: Fairies Praying To Heaven 2: Great Devil's Return Match
description: Use different skills, sometimes make good use of dungeon gimmicks, and overcome the strong enemies that stand in your way! The fairies begin to move again to resolve the happening in Gensokyo.

name: Icarus84
description: Recreate yourself and break free from the simulation, in ICARUS84, a focused retro ARPG that will take over your mind and heart, but not your life. Make the build that plays the way you want to play, unravel the mystery behind why you're trapped, and find a way out.

name: Corridor VR
description: Welcome to a mind-bending virtual reality experience like no other. Dive into a captivating puzzle platformer where reality is not what it seems. In this thrilling VR game, players wield the extraordinary power to shift seamlessly between two parallel worlds: the normal world and the mirror world.

name: MelodyJourney
description: A light and casual music game with multiple nested modes. In game, players take on the role of a slime with an unknown background, collecting energy through rhythm-based gameplay to power up a spaceship and uncover its story.

name: Retro Abyss: Last Wish of the Game
description: The past and the future, a dream and a memory, the abyss and the surface, casual and hardcore... this game is an action game that resides in-between.

name: The Void Project
description: The Void Project is a fast paced arena shooter that throws you into an arena simulation. Face different kind of demons, overcome their patterns and finish them off in as less time as possible to reach the top of the leaderboard and make yourself worthy of calling ~The Void Breaker~.

name: Trouble In Paradise
description: Dive into an adventure where you unlock characters, control vehicles, and master your weapons. Solve puzzles, relax by beaches, and shop at local markets. Collect 'kilos’ for snacks and health. Enjoy retro visuals, hand-drawn cutscenes with amateur voiceovers, and a groovy original soundtrack.

name: Die, Pablo!
description: The world famous chef Louis is mad! He animates all sorts of inanimate objects to attack the restaurant critic Pablo for an alleged bad review of his restaurant. Luckily, Pablo likes playing tower defense games and knows exactly how to defend himself!

name: Cryowakers
description: Cryowakers is an exploration and survival game that takes place in a randomly-generated futuristic world. Play solo or with seven other players to explore, survive, build, and fight to uncover the truth behind the cryosleep experiments.

name: Hyperdrive Inn
description: Dive into the mysteries of an infinite hotel. Unveil an ever-shifting adventure where every playthrough is unique. Immerse in fabric-crafted visuals, guided by an enchanting score inspired by Finnish folk music. Hyperdrive Inn is a point-and-click journey like no other.

name: Agent Heart: Deception
description: Join Agent Steve Heart, an experimental augmented military operative, in a thrilling episode of deception, mystery, action, and seduction. Embrace your fate and experience an unforgettable journey filled with relentless challenges and the promise of future conflicts.

name: Brawl Tactics: Origins
description: Brawl Tactics: Origins fuses deck-building roguelikes and the tactics RPG genre like never before - lead your units, collect valuable trinkets and cast powerful spells to ensure victory!

name: 3 Hit Blunders Bundle
description:
A collection of 80's retro inspired games (Commodore64 / ZX 48K Spectrum/ Arcade):
- Ah 'ate those flockin birds - A 2d arcade shooter
- Retroa Retroa Builda - A 2d precision platformer
- Slime? Climb? - A 2d puzzle block climber

name: Shadows of the Damned: Hella Remastered
description: Shadows of the Damned, an action-adventure road trip through hell, has been remastered at last! Get ready for a story about rock, love, and just a little bit of demon slaying.

name: Daemonium
description: Daemonium is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror. Demonic possessions are running rampant. Grab your equipment and your team and get to work locating and removing the source of the demonic presence. Enter the portal to the demons home and stop the possession once and for all.

name: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot
description: The goo used to artificially grow humans has become self-aware and risen up against its creator! Devour humans, grow weapons from your body, fight against everything, and challenge the Despot himself!

name: Limbs
description: Limbs is a one to two player dexterity game where you take control over the limbs of a string puppet. Immerse yourself in a handcrafted world where moving each limb individually makes for challenging but rewarding and hilarious gameplay.

name: Cursed Broom
description: Fly with Maya through this charming 2D platformer! Find your way through the different parts of Maya's hometown, collect artifacts to gain different powers and experience a heartfelt tale of self-discovery and friendship.

name: Insectoid Descent
description: Shoot, slice and blow your way through the relentless swarm in a top-down pixel art world. At your service is a combat drone, reclaim scrap and use refinery for health & resupply. Explore and find upgrades, defeat the hive mind.

name: Bitch Hell
description:
Alex is a girl plagued by constant nightmares of flesh, rust and grime.
Fight your way through the night as you spiral into... Bitch Hell.

name: Bruxa
description: local multiplayer control swapping skatelike!

name: Souno's Curse
description: An action platformer inspired by Hollow Knight and Journey. Featuring metroidvania elements and a surprising story about regret and living in the moment

name: Hannah
description:
Hannah is a puzzle platformer horror survival game. You play as Hannah, a teenager born in the 80s, who tries to understand her personality by taking an internal journey to her childhood and discovering what went wrong.

You will immerse yourself in the depths of this dreamlike reality in which Hannah will have to be cunning, to solve puzzles; use the elements at your disposal to create devices and vehicles and avoid dying on the way.

name: Monospaced Lovers
description: Clara wakes up to a phone that isn't hers. Make friends, dodge bullets, and uncover the truth in this narrative platformer about closeness and distance.

name: Hellseed
description: Hellseed is a first person horror adventure with puzzles and some action elements.

name: Dragon Age: The Veilguard
description:
Select from different races and combat classes, customize your appearance, choose your character’s backstory and begin your journey as Rook, Dragon Age’s newest hero.

Select from three classes (Warrior, Mage, and Rogue), each with two distinct weapon types and unique abilities you can select between mid-combat. Experience new strategic depth as you combine fast-paced attacks, parries, and dodges with the companion ability wheel to exploit enemy weaknesses and seize victory with devastating combat combos.

The Veilguard contains several different factions, any of these could prove to be important ally during the story. Your faction choice will influence Rook's backstory, conversation options and more.

name: Ark: Survival Ascended - Fantastic Tames: Dreadmare
description: Shrouded in darkness and whispered about in legends, the Dreadmare is a creature of myth and nightmare. Use its uncanny abilities to control the battlefield, weaken your enemies, and strike from the shadows, as you ride into the apocalypse together!

name: DCS World: F-16C Dragon's Fury Campaign by SorelRo
description: Dragon's Fury: DCS F-16 Viper is a fictional story-based campaign that will test your skills using the DCS F-16 Viper in a variety of missions while you operate with the 23rd Fighter Squadron, The Fighting Hawks.

name: DCS World: AH-64D Outpost Campaign by Stone Sky
description: Explore the chronicles of the Syrian War in the OUTPOST campaign series. In the second installment, you'll dive into the events of 2012-2017, piloting the AH-64 Apache helicopter. Take on the role of U.S. pilots navigating through some of the most challenging phases of this conflict.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. V.I.P with V.W.P
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.5 feat. V.W.P
description: Sin descripción

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 2 - Mobile Weapon & Colony Laser Inner Wall
description: Diorama Pack 2 includes 1 background, 7 Mobile Weapons, and 13 Key Art Posters.

name: Gas Station Weed Simulator 2024
description: An immersive, analog-style simulator wherein the player explores a gas station, tries different varieties of cannabis, and interacts with the environment.

name: Gladiator's Arena
description: Win in the Gladiator's Arena! Dominate and conquer!

name: Reel Fishing: Days of Summer
description: Your Ultimate Fishing Trip Awaits!

name: Hood Ninja
description: How long can you survive in the hood? Hood Ninja is an intense, fast-paced third-person fighting game that throws you into the heart of a gritty neighborhood where survival is the only thing on your mind. The player will face different adversities and opportunities to stay alive in the streets.

name: The Hallowed Garden
description:
On the eve of Halloween, Lil Ghostie is hard at work on his pumpkin patch. But this isn’t your normal pumpkin patch, no, this is a magical pumpkin patch. With help from Mayor Macabre, Lil Ghostie is sure to have enough pumpkins in time for this year’s Halloween Festival!

This cute, cozy farming sim is the perfect game to play this Halloween. Whether you want to collect every pumpkin, want to leave it running as a BRB screen, or want to play it on your stream with your community, you are sure to get your Halloween vibe fill.

name: Trolddom
description: Old-school 2D MMORPG.

name: Plastic Trick
description: “Plastic Trick” is a choice-driven, visual novel where you play as a shopaholic named Serena - who's having a delulu romance with plastic mannequins that have come to life and are fighting for your kiss.

name: Arcade Archives: Riot
description: " RIOT " is an action game released by TECMO in 1992. Conquer the stages while defeating the "THE MAGIC TIGERS", warriors armed with special weapons and magic that stand in your way one after another. Enemies appear in the front and back of the screen, so you need to shoot them separately. The key to success is to make good use of various weapons and shields along the way.

name: Buildozer Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: A Boring Place: The Road 2 Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Game Of Thrall'an
description: Game of Thrall'an is an action RPG where players take on the role of a character named Thrall'an, embarking on a journey to the icy land of Alterrac, filled with enemies, to destroy the Ice Lord, Lookholar.

name: Tales of the Uncanny
description: A horror game featuring standalone stories filled with eerie atmospheres and unsettling mysteries. Each chapter reveals a new, chilling narrative where your choices shape the outcomes. Dive into the unknown and embrace the uncanny.

name: Wayward Puritans
description: Wayward Puritans is a spooky, survival horror-inspired single level for the Doom 2 IWAD, with an ending map in MAP02. Explore a creepy mansion, uncover the secrets of an ancient cult, and fight for your sanity against forces more terrible than social science can theorize! Taking inspiration from Resident Evil 1 and cosmic horror, combat has been extensively retooled, so be prepared to make due with more meager resources than your usual Doom map.

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 04
description: Full 32 map megawad of autumn/fall goodness brought to you by the fine folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone discord. Expect a lot of black and orange, healthy mix of natural, gothic and techbase environments, and a approachable difficulty for the most part.

name: Magic Cat Academy 3
description: Help Momo the Cat battle ghostly opponents across the atmosphere.

name: Call the Tune
description:
You'll be following Neo, a young idol dissatisfied with her life. After suddenly moving to a new school for one week, she finds herself wrapped up in the school's student council and its (unofficial) idol group.

But all takes an unexpected turn once a simple accident causes our cast to delve deeper into the school's lower floor. During a series of investigations done by the astute Detective Emilia Ruth, your actions will determine the conclusion of the case as well as the story as a whole.

name: Egg Raiders
description: Egg Raiders is a cooperative horror game where four players work together to infiltrate an area teeming with aggressive monsters. You must survive for three days, gather valuable loot, and escape before more monsters come after you. Teamwork and strategy are the keys to success!

name: Halley2061
description: This is a space sci-fi survival and building game. You take on the role of a retired astronaut on a top-secret mission to the Halley’s Comet. Resource and time management will be key to your survival. Will you wisely use limited supplies to build your own space base and achieve self-sufficiency?

name: Multiplayer Mongolians
description: Multiplayer Mongolians - They attacked Your village, They killed Your family. Revenge is a dish best served ... Mongolian! (Multiplayer or Single Player)

name: WolfFang Skull Fang Saturn Tribute Boosted
description:
The steel wolf running across the earth × the sonic corpse that buries its prey.
DECO shooting game redeployed!

name: Requiem For a Lost World
description: Requiem For a Lost World is a singleplayer/co-op roguelite bullet-hell game combining the fun of destroying thousands of enemies with unique builds and a pleasing stylized anime graphics. Unlock new characters, collect powerful weapons and create synergies with elemental reactions!

name: Game Of Fate
description: Immerse yourself in the first-person perspective, cross time and space, solve bizarre cases, save innocent victims, and catch a mysterious killer! You will solve murders, uphold justice, and also gain love. Are you ready? Play the "Game of Fate" that crosses time and space, life and death!

name: The Devil's Whisper
description: A psychological horror Visual Novel with a full voice cast. Immerse yourself in a haunting mystery filled with dark drama and a touch of romance. Multiple thrilling alternate endings to play through! Choose who lives and who dies.

name: Skater's Solstice
description: Become a master of the ice by skating your way through increasingly challenging sliding puzzles!

name: Late Homework
description: Retrieve your forgotten class assignments from school while avoiding the creature known to haunt it at night.

name: Warno: Nemesis #2
description: The Nemesis DLC lets players decide which pair of Divisions should come next. Each Nemesis DLC features 2 new Divisions and several new units. This Nemesis DLC will be voted on by the WARNO community at a future date.

name: Deepest Trench
description: Explore the hidden mystery of the Mariana Trench. An underwater local co-op game with immersive storytelling, stunning visuals, and dynamic gameplay, ‘Deepest Trench' offers an unforgettable adventure that challenges your skills and intellect.

name: Frights
description: A Cute Retro-Style Horror Survival Adventure. After a long day at the Riverside Forest, you wandered far from your parents...too far. Now it's nighttime and you can't seem to find your way back. As you follow the sweet voice of a sheep(?!), you fall inside an old, haunted cavern.

name: The Lost Gallery
description: Works of art are attacking people, turning an exhibition into a bloodbath in a single night. At the same time, you – a phantom thief – happen to be there to steal a valuable masterpiece.

name: The Territory of Egg 2
description: The Territory of Egg 2 is an unique tower defense indie game. Place Egg Towers, choose evolution branches, combine skills and build defenses. The souls of Heroic Eggs await your awakening! Explore and gather resources in the dark forest, unlock the technology tree, and defeat even stronger enemies!

name: O.W.L Projekt
description: O.W.L Projekt is a 3D isometric puzzle game that will test your mind and logic skills. Controlling Elysion, a young being created in a mysterious experiment, you will face the enigmatic Watchers in a journey to escape and uncover secrets.

name: Karate Survivor
description: Become a martial arts master in this survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use your fists, feet, and the environment to fight off relentless thugs. Master powerful combos, enhance your skills, and remember: everything around you is a weapon!

name: Sofie: The Echoes
description: Sofie: The Echoes is a third-person action-adventure game that immerses players in a story-driven experience. Explore diverse environments, solve challenging puzzles, and unravel the mysteries surrounding Sofie’s family.

name: Dolls' Domain
description: You find yourself in a dollhouse - can you escape, or will you meet your fate? Navigate through the escape room-style puzzles, and avoid being caught by the creatures who exist in this place, and gain your freedom from the dollhouse!

name: Euclid's Inferno
description:
Euclid's Inferno is a fast-paced 2D shooter where math is your enemy. Play as the father of geometry, explore a hellish version of the works of ancient mathematicians, and defeat polygonal beasts as you upgrade your geometric arsenal.

Euclid has found himself trapped in a demonic version of his magnum opus The Elements and must traverse the 2D plane and fight against hordes of mathematical constructs.

Defeat enemies and bosses inspired in greek mythology and the fundamentals of mathematics.

Pick up new weapons and abilities as you venture deeper into the abstract realms of geometry and arithmetic. Launch points, cast rays and trace circles to defeat your enemies.

Become the geometer of your own worlds with the custom level editor.

name: Stacklands 2000
description: Stacklands 2000 is the second DLC for Stacklands. Go to a modern world where you manage a big city's wellbeing, collect science to build futuristic technologies, prepare for natural disasters and more!

name: Heretical
description: Choose your hero and defeat the guardians of the Sanctora Mountain, as you attempt to reach the mountaintop and dethrone Abidan, a ruthless demigod cult leader. In a familiar rogue-lite manner, dying is part of progression, granting you new game mechanics, playable characters, skills, and weapons.

name: Time to Escape
description: "Time to Escape" is a cooperative puzzle game. Finding yourselves in a locked room, you and your friend, who is on the other side of the wall, must work together to solve complex puzzles. This must be done before the countdown timer reaches zero.

name: ZomBay
description: ZomBay is a zombie shoot'em up game. Survive waves of endless zombies and gain exp to get the best guns!

name: Unmasked: An Inner Journey
description: Unmasked: An Inner Journey is an immersive 2D action-adventure platformer with no dialogue. According to the game story, the player gets into the main character's consciousness and fights with inner fears and memories. The gameplay is a mix of running, jumping, combat, puzzle and boss fights.

name: Spirit Valley
description: Spirit Valley is an erotic creature collecting game. Build your dream team and solve the mystery of Spirit Valley!

name: Moment of Moonset
description: "Moment of Moonset" is a thriller story game. The heroine Pang Lu comes into contact with Aileen by chance, and encounters a strange mysterious power on the way to learn Aileen's identity. How should she respond, or should she choose to fall into crisis? Or escape intact? Or...

name: The Bonerooms
description: The Bonerooms is a goofy horror-themed multiplayer game about surviving in a living maze while being pursued by skeletons. Last one standing wins!

name: I Want To Go Home
description: I Want To Go Home is a first-person cleaning simulator game with a horror twist. Clean the restaurant and survive to earn money and unlock characters. Play solo or with up to 3 friends and experience the story that unfolds. All content updates will be free!

name: Xenos: Cartoon Creature Catcher
description: A retro creature collector/pet battler with a focus on hunting rare variants and making every Xeno unique. All Xenos have random stats and move-sets that vary even within the same species! Delve into a light-hearted world full of parody and fourth wall breaks while learning the world of Xenos!

name: Zombie Death Day
description: Battle for survival against zombie hordes. This FPS puts you at the frontline of the battle to repel the hordes, and save the human race. Lead the fight by destroying the infected.

name: Dong Wu: Odyssey
description: Dong Wu is a challenging RPG about legendary beasts. You will form a 4-person party and fight a battle of succession to claim the throne. In this thousand-year war, your enemy could be the noble or Miasma. Your fate depends on your strategy, luck and courage. Good luck!

name: Radiant Reckoning: Subterranean Odyssey
description: The only way to play is to survive every raids. The more you explore the open world more you get better loots.

name: Blackheart
description: Blackheart is a 2D single-player dark fantasy action RPG centred around the royal Blackheart family and the internal conflicts that are consuming them from the inside out.

name: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
description: Rusty's Day Off is a stylized FPS metroidvania in which you play as a janitor caught up in a wild adventure on his day off. Armed with your gadgets, you must navigate through complex facilities, solve puzzles, defeat rogue robots and jump & run your way through this day.

name: Vampire Hunters
description: Create absurd builds by stacking up weapons and raining down crazy firepower on vampires and demons in this rogue-lite retro FPS. Can you be known as the most outrageous Vampire Hunter in all of Transylvania?

name: Rogues Don't Cry
description: Rogues Don't Cry is a mix of roguelike and strategy game. Choose your hero, build an army, explore and fight enemies in a harsh procedurally generated world, with semi permadeath and a strong final boss.

name: Cell Scientist: Beyond
description: An exciting puzzle game with 50 levels story mode and easy to pick gameplay mechanics. Embark on an adventure to destroy viruses using futuristics nano ships and help the patients. Save the day using your puzzle-solving skills!

name: These Doomed Isles
description: Inspired by classic god games, survival city-builders and roguelike deck-builders, in These Doomed Isles you'll craft your deck of cards to raise islands from the sea, build settlements for your followers and keep them alive as famine threatens, forests burn and raiders loom on the horizon.

name: Dreamables
description: First-person survival horror You may encounter unrealistic monsters and be intrigued with luck.There is a small chance that you will die from anything that damages you. Be careful out there.

name: The Newton Mystery
description: The Newton Mystery is a 2D puzzle platforming adventure where you play as a group of friends who have formed a rag-tag monster crime-solving team. Join them on their journey of self-discovery, wacky interactions, and realizations that everything is not as it seems in the sleepy town of Newton...

name: Frameland: A Binary Tale
description: Frameland is a retro inspired RPG brought into the modern age. The story is not about you. You are just in it.

name: Scramble: Battle of Britain
description:
Scramble: Battle of Britain is a simultaneous turn-based dogfighting game. Set in a 3D airspace, the game features fast-paced, tactical combat with dynamic flight physics.
Luftwaffe and RAF fighter squadrons go head to head over The English Channel. Competing players simultaneously issue control inputs for multiple aircraft while time is paused.
The planned orders are then played out simultaneously: shots are fired, loops are looped, colliding planes collide.

name: Dungeon Crusher: Soul Hunters
description:
Play it with just one finger!
Simple and instantly addictive gameplay!

The game is for real lazy ones, doesn't require a lot of time: the characters explore dungeons even if you're offline. All you need to do is take your reward from time to time.

The combat mechanics of the PvP competition is unique to games of this genre - collected heroes may be used both for leveling and for building arena squads to compete against other players in various competitions.

Key features of the game:
- Over 100 unique characters.
- Unique PvP combat mechanics.
- 9 powerful skills to be used in combat.
- Loot equipment from monsters
- Craft new items with 1000's of recipes
- Clans and their development.
- 8 science trees with over 100 different skills.
- Over 60 special artifacts.
- Battles with hundreds of different monsters.
- PvP-mode against other players.
- More than 10 amazing locations.
- More than 10000 levels.
- Daily tasks, quests and other objectives.

Some of game modes:
- Pass the caves and battle with the ordinary monsters.
- Search artifacts in special caves.
- Story mode which tells you about the game world.
- Battle with legendary bosses.
- Random combats with other players during the adventure.
- Arena: compete with other players.
- Mines: collect great treasures with your characters.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Japan Fishing Reserve
description: Welcome to Kamuibetsu National Park in Japan! Find the perfect spot to reel in unique new species, explore the untouched landscapes in Hokkaido, and tackle new story missions and challenges.

name: Life is Strange: Double Exposure - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Life is Strange: Double Exposure Ultimate Edition contains:

• Life is Strange: Double Exposure - complete game
• Spooky Outfit Pack
• Decades Outfit Pack
• Final Fantasy VII Outfit Pack
• Fan Favorite Outfit Pack
• Paw Prints Cat Outfit Pack
• Exclusive Cat Content

Max Caulfield, photographer-in-residence at the prestigious Caledon University, discovers her closest new friend, Safi, dead in the snow.

Murdered.

To save her, Max tries to Rewind time - a power she's not used in years… instead, Max opens the way to a parallel timeline where Safi is still alive, and still in danger!

Max realizes the killer will soon strike again - in both versions of reality.

With her new power to Shift between two timelines - can Max solve and prevent the same murder?

FINAL FANTASY and FINAL FANTASY VII are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.

name: Life is Strange: Double Exposure - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Life is Strange: Double Exposure Deluxe Edition contains:

• Life is Strange: Double Exposure - the complete game
• Spooky Outfit Pack
• Decades Outfit Pack

Both the Spooky Outfit Pack and Decades Outfit Pack will be available at launch of the base game.

SPOOKY OUTFIT PACK
Dial up the shivers and indulge your ghost-hunting, monster-wrangling passions with these outfits perfect for Halloween - or for witching hours all year round! This pack contains the Just Haunt It! coat and four indoor outfits: Maxidermy, Ragdoll Max, Max Ghoulfield, and Max O'Lantern.

DECADES OUTFIT PACK
Confront the inexorable passage of time and celebrate your colorful past, with iconic outfits that pay homage to 90s Grunge, 50s Rockabilly, 70s Flower Power, the 80s Mallrat, and 60s Psychedelia.

name: Quadrober Simulator
description: Are you a quadrober?

name: Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions
description:
Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions is the ultimate compilation of hunting grounds all over the world. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfil all your hunting fantasies. The wide world of Way of the Hunter allows you to follow the many storylines in hunting grounds all over the world, master the challenges of ethical hunting and solve intriguing cases of unethical behaviour. Or venture out in free hunt, and explore the breath-taking landscapes of North America, Europe, New Zealand and Africa to learn about habitats, animal behaviour and ultimately how to manage animal fitness in order to harvest the rarest and most impressive trophies.

This latest edition bundles 6 enormous hunting areas and includes agile UTVs for off-roading. All of this has been enriched with the cosmetics of the Hunter's Pack and the Outfits Pack: 5 alternative outfits for your playable hunters, a beautifully engraved antique shotgun, a cameo paintjob for the car and an impressive wooden carved statue for your Transylvania hunting lodge.

Wild Expeditions includes 6 amazing DLCs:

• Tikamoon Plains is a huge new hunting ground in Africa. Explore diverse landscapes, from windy mountains to deadly deserts and vast savannahs teeming with life.
