Join Malachi, a professional hunting guide, as he leads a group of adventurers through the thrilling world of Tikamoon Plains, inspired by the African wilderness. Includes bowhunting and 2 top-of-the-line hunting bows.

• Aurora Shores is a breath-taking hunting area in the northernmost part of the USA, the Alaskan wilderness. As a fresh graduate of the Wildlife Trooper School, your job is to protect the natural resources of Aurora Shores. Explore untouched nature with rich populations of wild animals, such as Kodiak bears, Roosevelt elk, Wood bison, and many more. Includes crossbows.

• Matariki Park in New Zealand offers a remarkable blend of biomes. Traverse hilly or mountainous terrain, home to the unique Himalayan tahr and the mighty Sambar deer, and venture into the lowland forest areas, the domain of the majestic Red deer. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty and lifelike wildlife that will keep you engaged for hours, all while offering insights into unique local habits and traditions.

• Lintukoto Reserve is an amazing hunting ground in Scandinavia and the newest addition to Way of the Hunter. Experience the adventures of game warden Mikael and discover the nature and animals of the European North.

• The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

• Hunter's Pack: a shotgun with engravings, a paintjob for the Car, and a wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge

name: JR East Train Simulator: Yokosuka Line (Kurihama to Tokyo) Series E217
description:
The Yokosuka Line is a 23.9 km long line connecting Kurihama Station in Yokosuka City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Ōfuna Station in Kamakura City, Kanagawa Prefecture. Although the official name of Ōfuna Station to Tōkyō Station is Tōkaido main line, trains run directly from Kurihama Station to Tōkyō Station, so the line between Kurihama and Tōkyō Stations is known as the Yokosuka Line.
The train leaves Kurihama Station for Yokohama Station via Yokosuka Station, a military port town; Kamakura Station,famous for the Daibutsu statue and Tsurugaoka Hachiman Shrine; and Ōfuna Station, where the train joins the Tōkaidō Main Line. After Yokohama Station, the line separates from the Tōkaidō Main Line near Tsurumi Station and heads for Shinagawa Station while running alongside the Tōkaidō Shinkansen via Shin-Kawasaki Station where the Shin-Tsurumi Engine Works, and Musashi-kosugi Station is spead. After Shinagawa Station, the line goes underground to Tōkyō Station, its final destination. We hope you enjoy the various landscapes from the suburbs to the city and the many parallel trains.

name: Forgotten Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: The Coma 2B: Catacomb - The Survivalist Youngho
description: Sin descripción

name: The Coma 2B: Catacomb - The Gamer Youngho
description: Sin descripción

name: The Coma 2B: Catacomb - The Child of Destiny Youngho
description: Sin descripción

name: Shooting Aircraft
description: I heard it takes a truck of shells to shoot down a plane? A decompression game that simulates anti-aircraft gun attacks on airplanes.

name: Konbini Baito to Stalker
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Claw Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Carved In Stone
description: Sin descripción

name: Choko Loco 2
description: A fairly linear action adventure game where you collect spam, extra lives and fight lovecraftian monsters. There is some exploration but it's more of an action game. I consider it of the "psychological horror" genre. It is also a 3d platformer, like Mario 64 but insanely twisted. You can also swim underwater, and you will have to to finish the game. There are other environmental hazards such as mud and slime.

name: Six Textures #3
description: 17 maps done with the main rule: *6 textures only* including the sky, but not including utility textures (trigger/clip/skip, etc.) or liquids

name: Rottweiler
description: an interactive essay on memes, labels, cauterization, and the decay beyond idealism.

name: Paper Puzzle Ⅱ
description: Place all the pieces into the grid, and as long as they don't overlap, you can clear the level. Simple rules but a real challenge. Want to give it a try?

name: Cazzarion: Drone Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Chained Climb Together
description: Balance between you and your partner, survive together! One chain - one life, prove your ability to cooperate!

name: Backrooms: Partygoers
description: Backrooms: Partygoers is a backrooms horror game based on Level 0 where you play as a researcher tasked to find anomalies inside the backrooms. You are equip with devices that can beep whenever an anomaly is near, where the partygoers roam and can hear you.

name: 100 Hidden Cats: Kitty House 2
description: 100 hidden Cats "Kitten House 2" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find one hundred cats (and one hundred rubber chickens) located on the map.

name: Hidden Cats: Haunted Mansion
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Haunted Mansion" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Void Path
description: "Void Path" is a first-person horror game set in a residential area of ​​Japan. There are no grotesque monsters. You explore a town depicted with retro-style graphics.

name: Happy Birthday: With Sergio Spellbound
description: Better than a birthday card. Use the Steam gift system to deliver this birthday present to your friends. The amazing Sergio Spellbound will ensure they have the magical birthday adventure of a lifetime. They will point and click their way to BIRTHDAY GLORY. If they’re lucky, they may even survive …

name: Space Cycle
description: Space resources are the battleground for warring factions. As a Space Defense Officer, protect your faction's assets in a vast, hostile universe. Allocate resources, upgrade defenses, and repel relentless enemy attacks! With over 50 unique units and deep strategy, experience real-time tower defense!

name: Hotelnomaly
description: Hotelnomaly is an endless loop anomaly hunt game where you play as a mechanic hired to fix an elevator in a lonely 1930s hotel. Discover eerie anomalies, navigate haunted corridors, and uncover dark secrets.

name: Eve: Galaxy Conquest
description:
From the creators of acclaimed MMO EVE Online, prepare to enter the vast cosmos of New Eden where intense factional warfare and diplomacy will force you to consider every decision, find allies, and outsmart your foes in a battle for seasonal supremacy.

You will start in an uncharted corner of the star sector, exploring your surroundings to secure your foothold in space. Exploiting nearby resources will allow you to upgrade your space station and ships for more ambitious ventures. As you continually expand and secure your territory you will encounter other players. Will you choose friendship? Or extermination? We leave that choice to you.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 3
description: In the final(?) route of this award-winning VN series, Seiji survives an attempt on his life by Kanoko, aka secret magical girl no. 3. The leads all point to a childhood tragedy and a certain deep-space Majin, so why him? And will Kanoko leave the dark side to save Seiji—and mankind—from herself?

name: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets
description: It’s your first day at Monster High, where all monsters are welcome… but some strange events are happening. Can you uncover the mystery of the doors and ancient keys and bring the school back to its authentic, spooky self? Play and discover its skulltimate secrets. Create your unique monster character with a vault full of different monster kinds, skills, and scary-chic looks to choose from. Explore the school with your beasties Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, and Frankie Stein, and find creeperific clues and powerful new skills. As the newest member of the Boo Crew, you’re in for one hex-citing adventure!

name: Nightmare Pursuit
description: Nightmare Pursuit is an intense multiplayer horror game where survivors must avoid the deadly traps and unique abilities of terrifying killers. Rely on stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive in horrific environments. Experience the thrill of the chase—escape or become the hunted.

name: Kimi ga Nozomu Eien: Enhanced Edition
description: "Kimi ga Nozomu Eien" returns as an Enhanced Edition! This legendary visual novel left fans emotionally wrecked for days after its release, and two decades later, its rollercoaster storyline still captivates hearts. Experience the romance that shook a generation!

name: Tennistronic
description: Increase your reflexes by hitting the ball that reaches higher speed with each bounce, and at the same time give it spin to score a goal to your opponent.

name: Zombie Blitzkrieg
description: Survive against zombies in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Outsmart your enemies in fast-paced battles using different weapons. Pick rewards and power up your character to conquer increasingly challenging levels.

name: Relentless Impetus
description: Classic FPS gameplay with exploration

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Garage Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Grab your Nintendo Switch and experience the everyday life of a police officer by joining the ranks of this fictitious American city's police force. Begin with parking violations and work your way up to shouldering greater responsibilities.

name: An Other Golf Game
description:
An Other Golf Game is not your typical openish world sandbox life-sim survival golf game experience featuring permadeath. Finally, now you can suck at golf virtually as much as you suck in real life.

You'll learn the art of golf on your own terms: picking clubs, assessing the wind, and, of course, tracking down that stray ball no matter where it lands. It’s a game for those who want to discover, adapt, and make every inch of progress on their own.

Beyond the golf course, life goes on—literally. You're living out entire days, where golfing may or may not be part of it, it's entirely up to you. You’ll have to keep yourself alive, managing food, water, and sleep while earning enough cash through odd jobs to keep your golfing dream alive.

It’s a game that tests patience, resourcefulness, and adaptability. If you’re willing to roll with the quirks, laugh off the Early Access growing pains, you might just discover an experience that’s both unexpectedly rewarding and thoroughly unconventional.

Welcome to An Other Golf Game. Good luck out there, and happy golfing… if you can survive long enough to get to it!

name: Life is Strange: Double Exposure
description: Max Caulfield, photographer-in-residence at the prestigious Caledon University, discovers her closest new friend Safi dead in the snow. Murdered. To save her, Max tries to Rewind time – a power she’s not used in years… Instead, Max opens the way to a parallel timeline where Safi is still alive and still in danger! Max realizes the killer will soon strike again – in both versions of reality. Only Max can Shift between the two parallel timelines to solve and prevent the same murder.

name: Void Mother: Survivor
description: Conquer Void Mothers horde of fever dream creatures in this action packed horde shooter. Theorycraft with player passives and navigate a fast paced world with randomly generated items whilst battling your way to become an unstoppable force.

name: Quarterstaff
description: Often outnumbered, never outmatched – carefully plan your moves to single-handedly save a besieged fantasy realm from the clutches of a sorcerous conqueror.

name: Honey Bee
description: Your main mission is to explore a vibrant and lively scenario filled with beautiful flowers. As a skillful bee, your goal is to collect the nectar from these flowers. But wait, there must be more to it, right?

name: Stellaris: The Grand Archive
description: The Galaxy is vast and full of wonders, and it is up to you to store records of all the unique lifeforms and marvels you will meet. Build a new megastructure, and collect examples of specimens you will meet in your space-faring adventures!

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 2
description: Seiji’s “tied by fate” again, this time with a magical girl one year his senior! In part 2 of this rowdy rom-com VN series, a freak faceoff sees Seiji become Maja’s familiar—and bound by an enchanted tether to survive. Will proximity lead to love, or is he doomed to serve till the end of (his) days?

name: No Heroes Here 2
description: A group of non-adventurers is the last hope in defending the castle in this co-op roguelite chaotic game. Organize your castle, purchase new items each day, work as a team to craft ammo, and shoot at enemies to protect your kingdom. Just because you’re no hero doesn’t mean you can’t save the day!

name: Reaper
description:
Reaper is a medieval-themed first-person shooter, drawing inspiration from such classic titles as Doom, Quake and Hitman.
Play as Death Incarnate, and follow the guidance of a mysterious spirit, tasking you with collecting the souls of a series of targets, and condemning them to the Hell below.

name: Ad Agency Simulator
description: Ad Agency Simulator offers a realistic simulation experience for those looking to embark on a career in the advertising industry. Are you ready to start creating your own advertising designs and managing your advertising agency, starting from a small advertising office?

name: Astronaut Assault
description:
Step into the boots of an Astronaut who is part of a non-violent expedition of Astronauts, when they suddenly come under attack from an alien robot army.

With no weapon, the Astronaut must lead the defense to save themselves and their people by building turrets to defeat waves of enemies and bosses. During the course of each level, the gameplay evolves from a focus on turret placement strategy to all out chaos and mostly running for your life during the later waves.

Experience a story mode with differing environments, enemies, and unique boss fights and a challenge mode that offers replay-able sandbox customization for turret usage, enemy combatants, difficulty settings, and achievement hunting.

name: Plains of Havoc
description: Decimate endless hordes of enemies across the nine realms of Yggdrasil for eternal glory! Plains of Havoc is a fierce 2D top-down roguelite set in the Viking afterlife in which you fight for your rightful place on the global leaderboards.

name: Otherlights
description: Otherlights is an action-RPG game with roguelike tendencies designed for 1 to 4 players. In this sunless world, unlock many heroes and develop their destinies to try to access the solar fragment guarded by the powerful Exharques.

name: An Engineer and the Great Machine
description: An Engineer and the Great Machine is a Bureau-punk Puzzle Game. Freshly hired and assigned to the new company project "The Great Machine", design, test and improve the systems that power "The Great Machine" and debug the strange outputs the keep producing...

name: Clock Tower: Rewind
description:
The Super Famicom classic, Clock Tower, is getting remastered for modern consoles.

This remaster is a collaboration effort between Capcom, Sunsoft, WayForward, and Limited Run. This remaster also marks the first time the original Clock Tower game will see an official release outside of Japan, which up until this point only had fan translations. The remastered version will utilize the Carbon Engine.

Clock Tower is a survival horror point-and-click adventure game developed and published by Human Entertainment for the Super Famicom in 1995. It is the first installment of the long-running Clock Tower series.

The story follows Jennifer Simpson as she learns the secrets of the Barrows Mansion and attempts to escape the game's antagonist, Scissorman.

Clock Tower originally released in 1995 and is not to be confused with the PlayStation 1 game Clock Tower released in 1996. The franchise only spawned four games, with the most recent release, Clock Tower 3, launching on the PlayStation 2.

name: Something's Out There
description: Something's Out There is a micro-horror creature hunting game, featuring multiple unique creatures across multiple maps. Hunters work together using the tools provided at base or found around the map to track down, hunt, and ultimately kill the creature of which only stories claim exist.

name: Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice
description:
Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice is a strategy and survival game where you have to keep your city running to avoid everything turning to ice. This is an official version of Frostpunk, one of the most popular PC hits in recent history, now made available on smartphones.

In Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice, a post-apocalyptic scenario awaits, although it's unlike any other: a modern ice age has left your city totally isolated from everything around it. Your city is humanity's last stronghold, and it's your job to help as many people as possible survive while making morally difficult decisions as you fight to get through another day.

Gameplay in this survival game is based on constructing buildings, gathering resources, and making tough decisions. Not only do you have to choose which buildings to construct but also how many workers are assigned to each one. As is typical in a strategic management game, you'll have to wait between each construction project or resource harvest until it's done.

Deciding your city's laws, on the other hand, is one of the most interesting and unique aspects of this game. The rules you set might seem extreme compared to today's laws, but this game is set in a post-apocalyptic world, so you'll have to do everything you can to ensure your survival. Both the decision- and law-making processes are practically identical to the original version of the game, which feels like a fresh take for this genre.

Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice is an excellent survival game with a good dose of strategy. To play it well, you'll need to think carefully before making important decisions in this icy world. This game stands out for its infinite possibilities as well as its difficulty. While your city might not survive on your first attempt, you'll get better at living in the deadly world of Frostpunk each time you play.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Dawn's Guardian
description: Prepare for the battles to come with Japanese Tier V Premium battleship Hyūga and a fresh supply of camouflages, credits, Boosters, and Global XP.

name: NBA 2K25: Tournament Edition
description: Silence the doubters and lead the greatest dynasty the NBA has ever seen in MyCAREER; explore endless possibilities as a General Manager in MyNBA; become the GOAT in The W; and showcase your innovative MyTEAM lineup in single-player and multiplayer modes. Express your personality with an extensive array of customization options and become one of one in NBA 2K25.

name: Castlevania: The Adventure - Masque of Retribution
description:
Battle against Dracula's forces once more as Christopher Belmont in Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution!
Enhanced Visuals, smoother controls and gameplay, remixed and remastered OST, a completely overhauled set of bosses; Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution is the definitive way to play this reimagined classic by Konami!
As with the previous WarMachine Studios releases, this is a NON-PROFIT FAN REMAKE. No monies were exchanged in any way for the creation of this game. Like the others, it was done out of fun and love for a forgotten game series.

name: Dreamland Farm: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sinking Forest
description: A short horror story set in Japan with a great setting and a story with drama and violence.

name: Graffiti Simulator
description: Become a great graffiti artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to paint graffiti? Now you can do it in our Graffiti Simulator.

name: Dreamland Farm: Stone Fence and Tiles
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamland Farm: Kitchen Furnitures
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamland Farm: House Furnitures
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai World: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamland Farm: Banner
description: Sin descripción

name: WhereTaken
description: Place a pin on the map to guess where in the world a photo was taken. Players have 5 rounds of distinct locations, earning up to 200 points per round depending on how close their guess is to the photo depicted.

name: Finnish Cabin Mayhem: Mökkimähinä
description: Alcohol. Action. Violence. Get ready to take your friends "behind the sauna" using whatever there is at hand.

name: Flagaroo
description:
Get it right and discover new flags!
Enjoy playing Flagaroo and test your knowledge of world flags!

name: Leshy Prelude
description: A horror action-adventure with a gripping story. Fight through the forest using energy granted to you by greater powers lest you succumb to the will of the forest guardian Leshy.

name: Foot Step
description: Foot Step is a game in which you need to control a little man and dodge kicks. When it comes into contact with cells, the foot will destroy them underneath it, but if the foot collides with a round object, the foot will not be able to break through it and will stop on this line, turning the round object into a regular cell. The goal of the game is to advance gradually without getting kicked or falling onto the spikes below.

name: Afterlight Catacombs
description: Afterlight Catacombs is a horror exploration game in which you attempt to escape a procedurally-generated labyrinth while a mysterious stalker chases you in the dark. Explore the winding tunnels, learn the secret about this dungeon and, above all, do not let your torch run out!

name: Livers Ikusei Card Game
description: This game is a "Deck-Building Liver Development Card Game."You will nurture aspiring livestreamers (Livers) and help them become outstanding Livers.The goal is to earn as many LP (Liver Points) as possible.To achieve this, you'll need to build an optimized deck.

name: Beware Tomorrow
description: You must escape a mysterious facility and solve complex puzzles in this psychological horror game. An unseen entity manipulates both you and a deranged man, forcing you to make life-or-death decisions to survive.

name: Deathbound: Accepted by Death
description: Enter the mysterious liminal space between Life and Death a floating rock in the void. In this epic DLC you must release the great essences of the 5 bosses representing five stages of grief – Denial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression and Acceptance – before unlocking Path to Death for the final showdown with Grief – The Purifier – the mightiest of them all.

name: Laundromat Simulator
description: Furnish, Manage, and Maintain multiple stores in Laundromat Simulator! Collect and Count your hard-earned pennies and improve your stores to keep customers happy and maximize your profits. Expand your business, improve customer experience, and make your laundromat the best in town!

name: Fall Platform
description: Fall Platform is a puzzle game that consists of climbing as high as possible until reaching the top without falling, no saving possible, the game wants to be the most difficult on the steam market. legend has it that those who manage to finish the game will have an IQ between 120 and 200.

name: Scribe
description: Scribe is a scribe simulator in which you can secretly shape the destinies of the inhabitants of the estate: resolve disputes, influence the course of family intrigues, decide who lives and who does not. Choose what to write in letters and whether to change their recipients!

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange and Pumpkins: Spooky Halloween Edition
description: Celebrate Halloween night with cute capybaras with orange! Find all the hidden capybaras in their Halloween costumes and light up the town on this magical night. A fun-filled adventure awaits you!

name: Hidden Cats: Spooky
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Spooky" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Halloween
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Halloween" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Anomaly Tapes: Beyond Reality
description: Uncover the truth in '[ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality'. Navigate through haunting levels, survive deadly anomalies with unique mechanics, and piece together a chilling mystery hidden within the tapes. Dare to uncover the secrets?

name: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
description: A broke young man takes on the night shift at a roadside diner. In the glow of the blood moon, routine tasks turn into a fight for survival. First-person horror based on a dark creepypasta with a set of rescue rules.

name: System Death
description: Stylistically rich retro fast-paced combat open world fps space shooter with different weapons, space traps and bosses

name: BattleCards Saga
description: BattleCards Saga, the strategic card game where every fusion reveals a new creature and every battle shapes your legend.

name: Forgotten Memories: Remastered Edition
description:
A new Forgotten Memories: Remastered Edition is coming! Tons of new stuff and improvements!

Take a deep breath and get ready for the horror of Forgotten Memories.

In Forgotten Memories, you take on the role of Rose Hawkins, a determined police detective who finds herself caught in a web of enigmatic events while investigating a strange case. As Rose wakes up in an eerie, unfamiliar place, she encounters Noah, a mysterious and striking woman who offers her a deal. This precarious alliance promises to aid Rose in her investigation but at what cost?

name: Mom
description: Mom says I can't get out of my room after 12:00 AM. But I always hear the door opening and closing after that hour. Why isn't mom sleeping?

name: Lady Dracula's Mansion
description: Explore a creepy gothic mansion and survive the night while being hunted down by a lady dracula! Lady Dracula's Mansion is an FPS horror game with retro graphics where you must sneak around and use your wits while scavenging whatever weapons and resources you can find to help you survive.

name: Stunt Granny
description: Stunt Granny is a funny action game where you wake up and choose violence. Run over unsuspecting third graders, perform sick stunts, and swag out your mobility scooter. Casually drift around, collecting secrets and competing in challenges and races. Or just run over the kids — up to you, really.

name: Kajipeet
description: Kajipeet is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players. In this game you will have to try on the role of a marshmallow samurai and show your friends who is the main marshmallow here. Katanas, maps, bonuses and a lot of fun!

name: Platform
description: Humans are imprisoned on a platform filled with evolved creatures. Scientists investigate that the creatures feed on fear. Are you ready to survive and face your dark fears?

name: Abnormality
description: Abnormality is an authentic & realistic multiplayer ghost-hunting horror game. Explore fully abandoned locations, investigate, and find evidence of the paranormal, but beware—the former residents may not appreciate your intrusion. Use night vision goggles to navigate through the pitch darkness.

name: Bloons Card Storm
description: A turn-based collectible card game set in the Bloons universe.

name: Louie's Mansion
description:
Louie wins a free mansion, AND IT'S FULL OF FREE FOOD?!
Help the President save Olimar and his debt from the wicked ghost!
Will Louie Survive the Horrific Ghouls?! (Probably, it's Louie we're talking about)

What Is Louie's Mansion?

An overhaul of Luigi's Mansion to replace everything Super Mario related with Pikmin.
That means, every ghost, treasure, characters, all Pikmin!!

name: Liminalcore
description: Explore and admire while navigate through eerie, surreal environments inspired by the Backrooms lore. Explore this uncanny world lost in time and get lost in the otherworldly architecture in a world where reality bends and your sanity is tested.

name: Xenowars
description: This is a turn-based strategy/RPG game set in the stars. In the early stages, you will recruit a team of experts on Earth for exploring a distant alien homeworld, choosing between scientists, mutants, and soldiers. Scour the planet for lost alien technology and uncover the secrets to Earth’s doom.

name: ShipOS 1994
description: Are you ready to recover your family's fortune and rebuild the greatest shipping empire the world has ever known? Well if you are, then you're going to need the latest integrated shipping management system to get you there. Welcome, to ShipOS 1994

name: FootCareer Ult
description: FootCareer ULT, the new way of Football SimulationFootCareer ULT is the latest and most simplistic Football Career simulation game there is. Want to becomethe greatest (or the worst)? Then try FootCareer ULT today!

name: Waffle Cone Willie
description: In this first-person survival horror game, run and hide from Waffle Cone Willie, a haunted ice cream truck that roams through the town of Sweetwater seeking his next victim. Find clues, survive, and uncover the mystery and nightmare of Sweetwater.

name: ColdRidge
description: Immerse yourself in a turn-based exploration game set in the mystical Wild West. Strategically plan your moves to navigate cursed terrains, uncover magical artifacts, and explore uncharted lands. Don't be fooled by the calm plains of Coldridge, take a gamble and unveil its mysteries!

name: The Witch's Cauldron: Supporter Pack
description: The Witch's Cauldron Supporter Pack is a great opportunity for players to support our studio and to enjoy exclusive content that comes with it while we continue to work on improving and expanding the game. Let's see what you can expect from it.

name: The Nightmare Chronicles: Horror In Da Hood
description: Mason is assigned a new job from the big boss when strange things start happening and he discovers the true meaning of fear... Horror in Da Hood is a gripping first-person horror game set in the hood, where the supernatural lurks around every corner. Are you brave enough to face the real terror?

name: There's No Monsters
description: Have you checked under the bed? Or in the closet? We guarantee there's no monsters there!

name: Mr. Pompy's Extravagant Quiz
description: You'll be putting your brains to the test as you navigate this terrifying trivia and puzzle experience with Mr. Pompy's Extravagant Quiz. While point and click may be your primary tools, your intellect and cunning are just as important.

name: Where is Love?
description: "Where is Love?" is a dark, choice-driven comedy that questions love and family, with a painful sting in your nostrils and the acrid aftertaste of vodka.

name: Across the Abyss: Voidborn
description: Enemies are your best weapon in this mix of Vampire Survivor and Hades! Slash and throw probes at bio-engineered foes, while meeting quirky characters and wielding elemental powers against an evil galactic mega corp. Get stronger, go further, and conquer the chaos!

name: Breach the Abyss
description: A sci-fi wave-based shooter with roguelite elements. Collect powerful upgrades and unique combinations to wipe out hordes of bloodthirsty creatures and make your way into the Abyss.

name: Tales of Lost Ages Vol 1.
description: Anthology of Four 3D Action-Adventure Dungeon-Crawlers!

name: Deadzone Blackout
description: Deadzone Blackout is a competitive, fast-paced, arcade FPS. Immerse yourself in the pure adrenaline of a frantic, almost generic FPS. Master the fast-paced action, show off your quick reflexes and claim victory!

name: Glue 10
description: Create and control physics-based vehicles and structures with total freedom to win the Glutenberg challenges.

name: Paraplasm: Beyond the Veil
description: You fell into this cursed house! But will you be able to cope with the paranormal activity? Solve the puzzles and try to find your way out!

name: The Fear Business
description: The fear of the scared ones keep them alive, VHS supernatural survival horror.

name: Skulltide
description: Skeletal mischief reigns as the Skulltide begins! Join the undead in co-op adventures as the skeleton of your dreams, or lead them yourself, and hunt down the necromancers who reanimated you. Try not to misplace your bones along the way!

name: Outbreak Overlord
description: Turn the entire population into zombies before your horde is exterminated. Be strategic in your attacks and become the apocalypse itself.

name: Despot Zombie
description: The AI within could be humanity's salvation…or its end. Experience mind-bending combat, explore a dark fantasy wasteland, and unravel a twisted tale as Kurt, humanity's unwilling hope.

name: Massacre At The Mirage
description: For less than the price of a movie ticket, experience your very own horror-fueled slasher flick in Massacre at the Mirage. Step into The Mirage cinema and face a chilling nightmare, where staff and patrons must survive a masked killer's rampage.

name: Don't Be Afraid 2
description: Descend deep into the nightmare that seamlessly blends with reality in this uncanny horror escape room game. Can you find your way out of the horrid mansion or will you succumb to your fears? Can you face and overcome your past, or will it break you?

name: Backrooms: The Hunt
description: You are a member of the newly formed department of Artifact Hunters within the company B.E.I. Your role involves seeking and collecting enigmatic artifacts within the Backrooms. This department emerged following the successful stabilization of a portal

name: Bat Blast!
description: Bat Blast! is a 2D game about magical bats. Take control of one of many magical fruit bats, and blast your way upwards through the minions of 'The Master' as you strive to escape his tower.

name: Keep Keepers
description: Chaotic co-op fun meets deep strategic decisions. Fortify your keep while balancing income and defense to expand your arsenal and to automate your economy. Every run changes enemies, challenges, tools and weapons. Hire up to 3 friends – or defend alone!

name: Don't Scream
description:
If you scream, you restart. Don't Scream is an Unreal Engine 5 short horror experience inspired by '90s camcorder found footage. Made by two indie devs. The challenge is simple: explore the mysterious Pineview Forest for 18 minutes without screaming.

Sounds easy, right? But there's a catch. Time only progresses as you move, and you cannot predict the scares. You must calibrate your microphone in-game so that every whimper, jump, or even a minor squeak is registered as a scream, increasing the challenge. With dozens of dynamic scares, each playthrough offers a unique experience.

name: Jennifer's Fragments
description: Jennifer is trying to piece together her fragmented life amidst the games of her mind. Help Jennifer piece together her memories in dark, uncanny and mysterious places. Get ready for a journey of terrible secrets and traumas.

name: Going Down
description: Descend into the haunting depths of the human psyche in this horror RPG adventure.

name: Muscle Ninja VR
description: This is a VR climbing action game with grip controls. Become a challenger of the muscle athletic show "Muscle Ninja" and conquer the steel demon castle! Your play can be streamed to an external monitor from a third-person perspective. Use your VRM model as your avatar and stream it!

name: Shadows Are Alive
description: Enter the ever-changing world of Shadows Are Alive! Team up, channel epic alter-egos, and outwit "The Shift" in a shape-shifting haunted mansion. Relentless suspense, vibrant visuals, and unmatched strategy. Can you escape the mansion before time runs out?

name: We Could Be Heroes
description: We Could Be Heroes is a retro style, action packed beat ‘em up in the style of classic 90s brawler arcade titles. Featuring a huge array of attacks, destructible environments and brutal deaths. Become a hero and fight bad guys while stopping crimes and rescuing innocent civilians along the way.

name: My Neighbour is a Bunny Demon
description: A Visual Novel thriller about surviving the machinations of a supernatural seductress. Entangled by a whirlwind romance, you find yourself thrust into a web of paranormal plots and perils.

name: Shred the Undead
description: Shredthe Undead, is a 4 player musical co-op hack-and-slash games. Instead of warriors, elves and wizards, you will be slaying zombies with guitars, drum sticks and piano keys. Travel from LA to Hell in 28 levels.

name: Crash Course Builder
description: Can you make it to the finish line? Crash your kart through impossible obstacle courses that will leave you wanting just… one… more… go! 2ez? Pfft! Build your own course to share with other crash test dummies!

name: When the Light Dies
description: When the Light Dies is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a desolate, frozen wilderness. Step into a murky world of shadow and obscurity as a lone survivor fighting to keep the darkness and the horrors that lurk within at bay.

name: Fruitbus
description: Fruitbus is a cute culinary adventure, set in an open world where taste is everything. Upgrade your trusty truck and visit a whole world of new destinations together.

name: The Legend of Santa
description: Run and jump through the North Pole on a quest to take back Santa's Workshop from the evil South Pole Troll and save Christmas!

name: Ascending Inferno
description:
Ascending Inferno is your ultimate goal in this gorgeous, challenging-but-fair 2.5D precision platformer with a ball.

Playing as Dani, it’s not enough to run, jump and platform your way out of Hell - you’ll need to dribble, kick and header her dead brother Vincent’s ball-shaped soul along with you!

Just be sure you don’t fumble the ball - the depths of Hell is a long way to fall…

name: Abaddon's Veil
description: Abaddon's Veil is a short dread-driven space submarine horror game inspired by Iron Lung.

name: Nimrods: GunCraft Survivor
description: Assemble a limitless arsenal in this survive-em-up roguelite shooter. As a Gun Manufacturer's testing force, your mission is simple: test the latest gun tech and scavenge alien planets. Collect insane weapon parts to invent crazy guns that slay thousands. You may not survive, but your guns will!

name: Mr. Stretch and the Stolen Fortune
description: Stretch from platform to treasure in this unique, supernatural puzzle-platformer game.

name: Tostchu
description: A slow-burn atmospheric horror game about managing a toast shop in a desolate location in Central Anatolia, Turkey. Make toasts for customers, cash in, buy more ingredients, and witness strange events unfolding.

name: Sulfur
description: Sulfur is a modern old-school action-adventure: Outsmart enemies, find treasure, improve weapons, harness powers. Delve deeper, find answers, make it end.

name: Keeper's Toll
description: Rise, fallen hero! Keeper's Toll, a harrowing journey into a dark and retro world that demands skill and courage. Every moment could be your last, but with each setback, you grow stronger. Embrace the challenge, overcome daunting foes, and cleanse the world of its cursed lands.

name: Moon Mystery
description: Moon's haunted. No really. Figure out what happened up there, unravel the moon’s mysteries, and uncover why we really raced to land on its surface in 1969. Fill up on oxygen, load up your guns, and set out on a celestial FPS investigation that starts on the Moon and leads across the universe.

name: Blade & Sorcery: Nomad
description: The era of the VR weightless, wiggle-sword combat is over. Blade & Sorcery: Nomad is a medieval fantasy sandbox like no other, focusing on melee, ranged and magic combat that fully utilizes a unique and realistic physics driven interaction and combat system. Built exclusively for VR, collisions are dictated by fine hitboxes, objects have weight and follow the laws of physics, creatures have full body physics and presence, and blades can be used to penetrate soft materials or deflect magic. In Blade & Sorcery: Nomad, the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your weapon, choose your stance, choose your fighting style; Be the powerful warrior, ranger or sorcerer you always dreamed of becoming!

name: Pure Rock Crawling
description: Pure Rock Crawling is a game build around the concept of making the best tire and the best suspension simulation. The main goal was to create a slow, immersive ride throughout rocky trails, forest hills and flat deserts. That kind of ride is the best way to admire beauty of rock crawling.

name: Devilated
description: Devilated is a timeslowing, monster blasting, boomer shooter with RPG pretensions, buckets of blood and a dose of ultraviolence.

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Dangerous Line
description: You are a hero who faces waves of enemies who are trying to get into your kingdom and seize power in it.

name: Colorfle Unlimited
description: Colorfle Unlimited: Challenge yourself with Colorfle, a color mixing puzzle game. Mix and match colors to guess the target combination in 6 tries. Play free, no download needed!

name: Super Mario Bros. Mini
description: Sin descripción

name: Skibidi Toilet: Battle Royale
description: Sin descripción

name: Drive Thru Miami
description: A simulation of running and expanding a drive-thru shop where players take orders, prepare various beverages and foods, manage supplies, and serve customers efficiently.

name: Drive Thru Simulator
description: A simulation of running and expanding a drive-thru shop where players take orders, prepare various beverages and foods, manage supplies, and serve customers efficiently.

name: Sewing Machine Simulator
description: Play as a prisoner in prison and operate a sewing machine. Use various methods to make him operate faster!

name: Innerscape
description: Play as Dr. Alan Miles, a parasite investigator, in a survival horror quest inside a critically ill alien. Use wits to battle biological horrors, uncover sinister truths, and survive.

name: Backroom Company
description: Backroom Company studies 'Noclip,' a supernatural phenomenon creating randomly linked backrooms. Its founders and purpose are unknown. Many explorers hired have disappeared in backrooms. Players trace past expeditions, farming unique items. Goal: deliver them to the main control room's dumbwaiter.

name: No More Humans
description: NO MORE HUMANS is a top-down single player wave based shooter, where you play as one of the unique survivors slaying and surviving waves of nightmarish enemies. Choose and modify your weapons and defeat fearsome bosses across different environments. Will you survive or die with the world?

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket
description: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket lets you easily collect Pokémon cards. Creatures Inc. has created exciting new visual effects for cards that are only possible digitally.

name: Phantom Patrol
description: A chilling VR co-op game where you investigate a haunted house, race against phantoms, and unravel eerie anomalies. Survival is a test of memory and teamwork!

name: Survive: Forgotten and Abandoned
description: Survive: Forgotten and Abandoned is a first-person survival horror experience. Six months have passed since the outbreak. Haunted by his past, Stanley Bell must find a way to survive between hallucinations and monsters.

name: Laser Tag Massacre
description: Halloween night turns deadly when five friends decide to throw a party in an abandoned arcade deep in rural Campinas, Brazil. What was meant to be just a game turns into their worst nightmare, proving that sometimes, play time can be deadly.

name: Hide 'N Seek!: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Parking Jam: Tasty Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Supreme Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Vsauce VR
description: Can you survive being explained to death?

name: Witch's Heart: Utsukushiki Hana to Akuma no Noroi - Kanketsu-hen
description:
A sequel to 『 Witch's Heart 』and『 Witch's Heart -Bonus Stage-』as one of four endings, by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment). This time, it focuses on one of the main protagonists and his conclusion: Wilardo Adler.

It is an adventure game with horror themes made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, and contains simple action scenes.

Although published as a separate game, it is part of the main game.

name: Air Hunter
description: Chase and Shoot!

name: The Yandere CEO
description:
William, the CEO of the company you just joined, had always been a man of ambition and success. From a young age, he was driven to achieve greatness, and he had a singular focus on his goals. He rose to the top of his field, building a successful company from the ground up.

However, his relentless drive also came at a cost. He pushed away friends and family, sacrificing personal relationships for the sake of his ambition. He had no time for romance, believing it to be a distraction.

Until he met you...

but you will find out for yourself what happens next..

name: Defeat Me
description: Sin descripción

name: Snaky Snakes
description: Slither through challenges, grow longer, and unlock exciting worlds!

name: 3D Workers Island
description: A short horror story about a screensaver.

name: The Traded Groom
description: a short 18+ otome about getting to know your new husband

name: Napobination
description: An action-rpg set in Naples, save the city from the local mafia who created an army of gigant crabs, use your skills to save your friends and fight bosses!

name: Art Detective: Hidden Through Ancient China
description: Unveil hidden wonders in masterpieces! Explore Qiu Ying’s iconic paintings with around 700 hidden objects. Relaxing, timer-free gameplay with hints, 6 hours of content. Discover art and mystery!

name: Tower of Madness
description: Tower of Madness is a linear psychological horror game where you play as a cowboy ascending an ominous floating upside down tower.

name: Love is in the Airship
description: In this wacky yuri dating sim, come aboard a magical airship cruise and experience romance, hijinks, and a crazy story with over 15 endings! Lots of choices and lots of really cute girls to date.

name: Super Mario and the Crystal Crescents
description: Sin descripción

name: Balkan Bloodbath
description: Become the next great dictator to forge a new Balkan Empire. Navigate the intense world of international trade and the stock market, use cunning espionage tactics to disrupt opponents, and overthrow and conquer your enemies. Strategy and secrecy are your keys to success in the Balkans.

name: Cat Apocalypse
description: Third person shooter with cats, as support pets of a Templar Special Force squad. Play as a cat and as an American soldier in this hard survival adventure!

name: Touhou Rock Maiden X
description: This game is a touhou fangame created by CAPRICORN.

name: Cat Survivors
description: This bullet hell roguelite pits you against waves of ferocious demons, where strategic upgrades and dynamic builds are your keys to survival. Can you outlast the demonic onslaught and emerge as the ultimate Cat Survivor?

name: Dust Courier
description: Dust Courier is a text game with pixel graphics and resource management. Navigate the wasteland using the map and face unpredictable situations. Make choices and deliver the cargo safely.

name: Warmage
description: Your city is under attack Warmage ! In this grid-based turn-based roguelite, defend the many different districts of your city against waves of enemies with the help of one of your students, and in between, buy and upgrade spells to prepare for the worst.

name: Disillusion ST
description: Strange journey throughout an elaborate labyrinth awaits featuring hundreds of characters and happenings as you try to gather items that once brought happiness to others. An early access glimpse at the prequel to Disillusion, the oneiric dungeon crawler detailing the events leading up to the tower's creation.

name: Doctor Arcana and The Secret of Shadowspire
description: Doctor Arcana's second adventure takes you to a legendary castle on a mysterious island where new puzzling challenges await and dark secrets are guarded by deadly traps. Can you complete the Trials of the Elders?

name: Heroes of Nature 4 in 1
description: Sin descripción
